150 void tab_manager::draw( const catacurses::window &w )
151 {
152  std::pair<std::vector<std::string>, size_t> fitted_tabs = fit_tabs_to_width( getmaxx( w ),
153  position.cur_index(), tab_names );
154  tab_map = draw_tabs( w, fitted_tabs.first, position.cur_index() - fitted_tabs.second,
155  fitted_tabs.second );
156  window_pos = point( getbegx( w ), getbegy( w ) );
157  draw_border_below_tabs( w );
158 
159  for( int i = 1; i < TERMX - 1; i++ ) {
160  mvwputch( w, point( i, 5 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXOX );
161  }
162  mvwputch( w, point( 0, 5 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XXXO ); // |-
163  mvwputch( w, point( TERMX - 1, 5 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXX ); // -|
164 }

166 bool tab_manager::handle_input( const std::string &action, const input_context &ctxt )
167 {
168  if( action == "QUIT" && query_yn( _( "Return to main menu?" ) ) ) {
169  quit = true;
170  } else if( action == "PREV_TAB" ) {
171  position.prev();
172  } else if( action == "NEXT_TAB" ) {
173  position.next();
174  } else if( action == "SELECT" ) {
175  std::optional<point> coord = ctxt.get_coordinates_text( catacurses::stdscr );
176  if( coord.has_value() ) {
177  point local_coord = coord.value() + window_pos;
178  for( const auto &entry : tab_map ) {
179  if( entry.second.contains( local_coord ) ) {
180  position.set_index( entry.first );
181  return true;
182  }
183  }
184  }
185  return false;
186  } else {
187  return false;
188  }
189  return true;
190 }

200 static int stat_point_pool()
201 {
202  return 4 * 8 + get_option<int>( "INITIAL_STAT_POINTS" );
203 }
204 static int stat_points_used( const avatar &u )
205 {
206  int used = 0;
207  for( int stat : {
208  u.str_max, u.dex_max, u.int_max, u.per_max
209  } ) {
210  used += stat + std::max( 0, stat - HIGH_STAT );
211  }
212  return used;
213 }
214 
215 static int trait_point_pool()
216 {
217  return get_option<int>( "INITIAL_TRAIT_POINTS" );
218 }
219 static int trait_points_used( const avatar &u )
220 {
221  int used = 0;
222  for( trait_id cur_trait : u.get_mutations( true ) ) {
223  bool locked = get_scenario()->is_locked_trait( cur_trait )
224  || u.prof->is_locked_trait( cur_trait );
225  for( const profession *hobby : u.hobbies ) {
226  locked = locked || hobby->is_locked_trait( cur_trait );
227  }
228  if( locked ) {
229  // The starting traits granted by scenarios, professions and hobbies cost nothing
230  continue;
231  }
232  const mutation_branch &mdata = cur_trait.obj();
233  used += mdata.points;
234  }
235  return used;
236 }
237 
238 static int skill_point_pool()
239 {
240  return get_option<int>( "INITIAL_SKILL_POINTS" );
241 }
242 static int skill_points_used( const avatar &u )
243 {
244  int scenario = get_scenario()->point_cost();
245  int profession_points = u.prof->point_cost();
246  int hobbies = 0;
247  for( const profession *hobby : u.hobbies ) {
248  hobbies += hobby->point_cost();
249  }
250  int skills = 0;
251  for( const Skill &sk : Skill::skills ) {
252  static std::array < int, 1 + MAX_SKILL > costs = { 0, 1, 1, 2, 4, 6, 9, 12, 16, 20, 25 };
253  int skill_level = u.get_skill_level( sk.ident() );
254  skills += costs.at( std::min<int>( skill_level, costs.size() - 1 ) );
255  }
256  return scenario + profession_points + hobbies + skills;
257 }
258 
259 static int point_pool_total()
260 {
261  return stat_point_pool() + trait_point_pool() + skill_point_pool();
262 }
263 static int points_used_total( const avatar &u )
264 {
265  return stat_points_used( u ) + trait_points_used( u ) + skill_points_used( u );
266 }
267 
268 static int has_unspent_points( const avatar &u )
269 {
270  return points_used_total( u ) < point_pool_total();
271 }
272 
273 struct multi_pool {
274  // The amount of unspent points in the pool without counting the borrowed points
275  const int pure_stat_points, pure_trait_points, pure_skill_points;
276  // The amount of points awailable in a pool minus the points that are borrowed
277  // by lower pools plus the points that can be borrowed from higher pools
278  const int stat_points_left, trait_points_left, skill_points_left;
279  explicit multi_pool( const avatar &u ):
280  pure_stat_points( stat_point_pool() - stat_points_used( u ) ),
281  pure_trait_points( trait_point_pool() - trait_points_used( u ) ),
282  pure_skill_points( skill_point_pool() - skill_points_used( u ) ),
283  stat_points_left( pure_stat_points
284  + std::min( 0, pure_trait_points
285  + std::min( 0, pure_skill_points ) ) ),
286  trait_points_left( pure_stat_points + pure_trait_points + std::min( 0, pure_skill_points ) ),
287  skill_points_left( pure_stat_points + pure_trait_points + pure_skill_points )
288  {}
289 
290 };
291 
292 static int skill_points_left( const avatar &u, pool_type pool )
293 {
294  switch( pool ) {
295  case pool_type::MULTI_POOL: {
296  return multi_pool( u ).skill_points_left;
297  }
298  case pool_type::ONE_POOL: {
299  return point_pool_total() - points_used_total( u );
300  }
301  case pool_type::TRANSFER:
302  case pool_type::FREEFORM:
303  return 0;
304  }
305  return 0;
306 }
307 
308 // Toggle this trait and all prereqs, removing upgrades on removal
309 void Character::toggle_trait_deps( const trait_id &tr, const std::string &variant )
310 {
311  static const int depth_max = 10;
312  const mutation_branch &mdata = tr.obj();
313  if( mdata.category.empty() || mdata.startingtrait ) {
314  toggle_trait( tr, variant );
315  } else if( !has_trait( tr ) ) {
316  int rc = 0;
317  while( !has_trait( tr ) && rc < depth_max ) {
318  const mutation_variant *chosen_var = variant.empty() ? nullptr : tr->variant( variant );
319  mutate_towards( tr, chosen_var );
320  rc++;
321  }
322  } else if( has_trait( tr ) ) {
323  for( const auto &addition : get_addition_traits( tr ) ) {
324  unset_mutation( addition );
325  }
326  for( const auto &lower : get_lower_traits( tr ) ) {
327  unset_mutation( lower );
328  }
329  unset_mutation( tr );
330  }
331  calc_mutation_levels();
332 }

334 static std::string pools_to_string( const avatar &u, pool_type pool )
335 {
336  switch( pool ) {
337  case pool_type::MULTI_POOL: {
338  multi_pool p( u );
339  bool is_valid = p.stat_points_left >= 0 && p.trait_points_left >= 0 && p.skill_points_left >= 0;
340  return string_format(
341  _( "Points left: <color_%s>%d</color>%c<color_%s>%d</color>%c<color_%s>%d</color>=<color_%s>%d</color>" ),
342  p.stat_points_left >= 0 ? "light_gray" : "red", p.pure_stat_points,
343  p.pure_trait_points >= 0 ? '+' : '-',
344  p.trait_points_left >= 0 ? "light_gray" : "red", std::abs( p.pure_trait_points ),
345  p.pure_skill_points >= 0 ? '+' : '-',
346  p.skill_points_left >= 0 ? "light_gray" : "red", std::abs( p.pure_skill_points ),
347  is_valid ? "light_gray" : "red", p.skill_points_left );
348  }
349  case pool_type::ONE_POOL: {
350  return string_format( _( "Points left: %4d" ), point_pool_total() - points_used_total( u ) );
351  }
352  case pool_type::TRANSFER:
353  return _( "Character Transfer: No changes can be made." );
354  case pool_type::FREEFORM:
355  return _( "Survivor" );
356  }
357  return "If you see this, this is a bug";
358 }

381 static matype_id choose_ma_style( const character_type type, const std::vector<matype_id> &styles,
382  const avatar &u )
383 {
384  if( type == character_type::NOW || type == character_type::FULL_RANDOM ) {
385  return random_entry( styles );
386  }
387  if( styles.size() == 1 ) {
388  return styles.front();
389  }
390 
391  input_context ctxt( "MELEE_STYLE_PICKER", keyboard_mode::keycode );
392  ctxt.register_action( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION" );
393 
394  uilist menu;
395  menu.allow_cancel = false;
396  menu.text = string_format( _( "Select a style.\n"
397  "\n"
398  "STR: <color_white>%d</color>, DEX: <color_white>%d</color>, "
399  "PER: <color_white>%d</color>, INT: <color_white>%d</color>\n"
400  "Press [<color_yellow>%s</color>] for technique details and compatible weapons.\n" ),
401  u.get_str(), u.get_dex(), u.get_per(), u.get_int(),
402  ctxt.get_desc( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION" ) );
403  ma_style_callback callback( 0, styles );
404  menu.callback = &callback;
405  menu.input_category = "MELEE_STYLE_PICKER";
406  menu.additional_actions.emplace_back( "SHOW_DESCRIPTION", translation() );
407  menu.desc_enabled = true;
408 
409  for( const matype_id &s : styles ) {
410  const martialart &style = s.obj();
411  menu.addentry_desc( style.name.translated(), style.description.translated() );
412  }
413  while( true ) {
414  menu.query( true );
415  const matype_id &selected = styles[menu.ret];
416  if( query_yn( string_format( _( "Use the %s style?" ), selected.obj().name ) ) ) {
417  return selected;
418  }
419  }

422 void avatar::randomize( const bool random_scenario, bool play_now )
423 {
424  const int max_trait_points = get_option<int>( "MAX_TRAIT_POINTS" );
425  // Reset everything to the defaults to have a clean state.
426  *this = avatar();
427  bool gender_selection = one_in( 2 );
428  male = gender_selection;
429  outfit = gender_selection;
430  if( !MAP_SHARING::isSharing() ) {
431  play_now ? pick_name() : pick_name( true );
432  } else {
433  name = MAP_SHARING::getUsername();
434  }
435  randomize_height();
436  randomize_blood();
437  randomize_heartrate();
438  bool cities_enabled = world_generator->active_world->WORLD_OPTIONS["CITY_SIZE"].getValue() != "0";
439  if( random_scenario ) {
440  std::vector<const scenario *> scenarios;
441  for( const scenario &scen : scenario::get_all() ) {
442  if( !scen.has_flag( flag_CHALLENGE ) && !scen.scen_is_blacklisted() &&
443  ( !scen.has_flag( flag_CITY_START ) || cities_enabled ) && scen.can_pick().success() ) {
444  scenarios.emplace_back( &scen );
445  }
446  }
447  const scenario *selected_scenario = random_entry( scenarios );
448  if( selected_scenario ) {
449  set_scenario( selected_scenario );
450  } else {
451  debugmsg( "Failed randomizing sceario - no entries matching requirements." );
452  }
453  }
454 
455  prof = get_scenario()->weighted_random_profession();
456  init_age = rng( this->prof->age_lower, this->prof->age_upper );
457  starting_city = std::nullopt;
458  world_origin = std::nullopt;
459  random_start_location = true;
460 
461  str_max = rng( 6, HIGH_STAT - 2 );
462  dex_max = rng( 6, HIGH_STAT - 2 );
463  int_max = rng( 6, HIGH_STAT - 2 );
464  per_max = rng( 6, HIGH_STAT - 2 );
465 
466  set_body();
467  randomize_hobbies();
468 
469  int num_gtraits = 0;
470  int num_btraits = 0;
471  int tries = 0;
472  add_traits(); // adds mandatory profession/scenario traits.
473  for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
474  const mutation_branch &mut_info = mut.obj();
475  if( mut_info.profession ) {
476  continue;
477  }
478  // Scenario/profession traits do not cost any points, but they are counted toward
479  // the limit (MAX_TRAIT_POINTS)
480  if( mut_info.points >= 0 ) {
481  num_gtraits += mut_info.points;
482  } else {
483  num_btraits -= mut_info.points;
484  }
485  }
486 
487  /* The loops variable is used to prevent the algorithm running in an infinite loop */
488  for( int loops = 0; loops <= 100000; loops++ ) {
489  multi_pool p( *this );
490  bool is_valid = p.stat_points_left >= 0 && p.trait_points_left >= 0 && p.skill_points_left >= 0;
491  if( is_valid && rng( -3, 20 ) <= p.skill_points_left ) {
492  break;
493  }
494  trait_id rn;
495  if( num_btraits < max_trait_points && one_in( 3 ) ) {
496  tries = 0;
497  do {
498  rn = random_bad_trait();
499  tries++;
500  } while( ( has_trait( rn ) || num_btraits - rn->points > max_trait_points ) &&
501  tries < 5 );
502 
503  if( tries < 5 && !has_conflicting_trait( rn ) ) {
504  toggle_trait_deps( rn );
505  num_btraits -= rn->points;
506  }
507  } else {
508  switch( rng( 1, 4 ) ) {
509  case 1:
510  if( str_max > 5 ) {
511  str_max--;
512  }
513  break;
514  case 2:
515  if( dex_max > 5 ) {
516  dex_max--;
517  }
518  break;
519  case 3:
520  if( int_max > 5 ) {
521  int_max--;
522  }
523  break;
524  case 4:
525  if( per_max > 5 ) {
526  per_max--;
527  }
528  break;
529  }
530  }
531  }
532 
533  for( int loops = 0;
534  has_unspent_points( *this ) && loops <= 100000;
535  loops++ ) {
536  multi_pool p( *this );
537  const bool allow_stats = p.stat_points_left > 0;
538  const bool allow_traits = p.trait_points_left > 0 && num_gtraits < max_trait_points;
539  int r = rng( 1, 9 );
540  trait_id rn;
541  switch( r ) {
542  case 1:
543  case 2:
544  case 3:
545  case 4:
546  if( allow_traits ) {
547  rn = random_good_trait();
548  const mutation_branch &mdata = rn.obj();
549  if( !has_trait( rn ) && p.trait_points_left >= mdata.points &&
550  num_gtraits + mdata.points <= max_trait_points && !has_conflicting_trait( rn ) ) {
551  toggle_trait_deps( rn );
552  num_gtraits += mdata.points;
553  }
554  break;
555  }
556  /* fallthrough */
557  case 5:
558  if( allow_stats ) {
559  switch( rng( 1, 4 ) ) {
560  case 1:
561  str_max++;
562  break;
563  case 2:
564  dex_max++;
565  break;
566  case 3:
567  int_max++;
568  break;
569  case 4:
570  per_max++;
571  break;
572  }
573  break;
574  }
575  /* fallthrough */
576  case 6:
577  case 7:
578  case 8:
579  case 9:
580  const skill_id aSkill = Skill::random_skill();
581  const int level = get_skill_level( aSkill );
582 
583  if( level < p.skill_points_left && level < MAX_SKILL && loops > 10000 ) {
584  // For balance reasons, increasing a skill from level 0 gives you 1 extra level for free
585  set_skill_level( aSkill, ( level == 0 ? 2 : level + 1 ) );
586  }
587  break;
588  }
589  }
590 
591  randomize_cosmetics();
592 
593  // Restart cardio accumulator
594  reset_cardio_acc();
595 }
596 
597 void avatar::randomize_cosmetics()
598 {
599  randomize_cosmetic_trait( type_hair_style );
600  randomize_cosmetic_trait( type_skin_tone );
601  randomize_cosmetic_trait( type_eye_color );
602  //arbitrary 50% chance to add beard to male characters
603  if( male && one_in( 2 ) ) {
604  randomize_cosmetic_trait( type_facial_hair );
605  } else {
606  set_mutation( trait_FACIAL_HAIR_NONE );
607  }
608 }
609 
610 void avatar::add_profession_items()
611 {
612  // Our profession should not be a hobby
613  if( prof->is_hobby() ) {
614  return;
615  }
616 
617  std::list<item> prof_items = prof->items( outfit, get_mutations() );
618 
619  for( item &it : prof_items ) {
620  if( it.has_flag( STATIC( flag_id( "WET" ) ) ) ) {
621  it.active = true;
622  it.item_counter = 450; // Give it some time to dry off
623  }
624 
625  // TODO: debugmsg if food that isn't a seed is inedible
626  if( it.has_flag( json_flag_no_auto_equip ) ) {
627  it.unset_flag( json_flag_no_auto_equip );
628  inv->push_back( it );
629  } else if( it.has_flag( json_flag_auto_wield ) ) {
630  it.unset_flag( json_flag_auto_wield );
631  if( !has_wield_conflicts( it ) ) {
632  wield( it );
633  } else {
634  inv->push_back( it );
635  }
636  } else if( it.is_armor() ) {
637  if( can_wear( it ).success() ) {
638  wear_item( it, false, false );
639  } else {
640  inv->push_back( it );
641  }
642  } else {
643  inv->push_back( it );
644  }
645 
646  if( it.is_book() ) {
647  items_identified.insert( it.typeId() );
648  }
649  }
650 
651  recalc_sight_limits();
652  calc_encumbrance();
653 }
654 
655 static int calculate_cumulative_experience( int level )
656 {
657  int sum = 0;
658 
659  while( level > 0 ) {
660  sum += 10000 * level * level;
661  level--;
662  }
663 
664  return sum;
665 }
666 
667 bool avatar::create( character_type type, const std::string &tempname )
668 {
669  set_wielded_item( item() );
670 
671  prof = profession::generic();
672  set_scenario( scenario::generic() );
673 
674  const bool interactive = type != character_type::NOW &&
675  type != character_type::FULL_RANDOM;
676 
677  std::vector<std::string> character_tabs = {
678  _( "POINTS" ),
679  _( "SCENARIO" ),
680  _( "PROFESSION" ),
681  //~ Not scenery/backdrop, but previous life up to this point
682  _( "BACKGROUND" ),
683  _( "STATS" ),
684  _( "TRAITS" ),
685  _( "SKILLS" ),
686  _( "DESCRIPTION" ),
687  };
688  tab_manager tabs( character_tabs );
689 
690  const std::string point_pool = get_option<std::string>( "CHARACTER_POINT_POOLS" );
691  pool_type pool = pool_type::FREEFORM;
692  if( point_pool == "multi_pool" ) {
693  // if using legacy multipool only set it to that
694  pool = pool_type::MULTI_POOL;
695  }
696 
697  switch( type ) {
698  case character_type::CUSTOM:
699  randomize_cosmetics();
700  break;
701  case character_type::RANDOM:
702  //random scenario, default name if exist
703  randomize( true );
704  tabs.position.last();
705  break;
706  case character_type::NOW:
707  //default world, fixed scenario, random name
708  randomize( false, true );
709  break;
710  case character_type::FULL_RANDOM:
711  //default world, random scenario, random name
712  randomize( true, true );
713  break;
714  case character_type::TEMPLATE:
715  if( !load_template( tempname, /*out*/ pool ) ) {
716  return false;
717  }
718 
719  // We want to prevent recipes known by the template from being applied to the
720  // new character. The recipe list will be rebuilt when entering the game.
721  // Except if it is a character transfer template
722  if( pool != pool_type::TRANSFER ) {
723  forget_all_recipes();
724  }
725  tabs.position.last();
726  break;
727  }
728 
729  // Don't apply the default backgrounds on a template
730  if( type != character_type::TEMPLATE ) {
731  add_default_background();
732  }
733 
734  auto nameExists = [&]( const std::string & name ) {
735  return world_generator->active_world->save_exists( save_t::from_save_id( name ) ) &&
736  !query_yn( _( "A save with the name '%s' already exists in this world.\n"
737  "Saving will overwrite the already existing character.\n\n"
738  "Continue anyways?" ), name );
739  };
740  set_body();
741  const bool allow_reroll = type == character_type::RANDOM;
742  do {
743  if( !interactive ) {
744  // no window is created because "Play now" does not require any configuration
745  if( nameExists( name ) ) {
746  return false;
747  }
748 
749  break;
750  }
751 
752  if( pool == pool_type::TRANSFER ) {
753  tabs.position.last();
754  }
755 
756  switch( tabs.position.cur_index() ) {
757  case 0:
758  set_points( tabs, *this, /*out*/ pool );
759  break;
760  case 1:
761  set_scenario( tabs, *this, pool );
762  break;
763  case 2:
764  set_profession( tabs, *this, pool );
765  break;
766  case 3:
767  set_hobbies( tabs, *this, pool );
768  break;
769  case 4:
770  set_stats( tabs, *this, pool );
771  break;
772  case 5:
773  set_traits( tabs, *this, pool );
774  break;
775  case 6:
776  set_skills( tabs, *this, pool );
777  break;
778  case 7:
779  set_description( tabs, *this, allow_reroll, pool );
780  break;
781  }
782 
783  if( tabs.quit ) {
784  return false;
785  }
786  } while( !tabs.complete );
787 
788  if( pool == pool_type::TRANSFER ) {
789  return true;
790  }
791 
792  save_template( _( "Last Character" ), pool );
793 
794  initialize( type );
795 
796  return true;
797 }
798 
799 void Character::set_skills_from_hobbies()
800 {
801  // 2 for an average person
802  float catchup_modifier = 1.0f + ( 2.0f * get_int() + get_per() ) / 24.0f;
803  // 1.2 for an average person, always a bit higher than base amount
804  float knowledge_modifier = 1.0f + get_int() / 40.0f;
805  // Grab skills from hobbies and train
806  for( const profession *profession : hobbies ) {
807  for( const profession::StartingSkill &e : profession->skills() ) {
808  // Train our skill
809  const int skill_xp_bonus = calculate_cumulative_experience( e.second );
810  get_skill_level_object( e.first ).train( skill_xp_bonus, catchup_modifier,
811  knowledge_modifier, true );
812  }
813  }
814 }
815 
816 void Character::set_proficiencies_from_hobbies()
817 {
818  for( const profession *profession : hobbies ) {
819  for( const proficiency_id &proficiency : profession->proficiencies() ) {
820  // Do not duplicate proficiencies
821  if( !_proficiencies->has_learned( proficiency ) ) {
822  add_proficiency( proficiency );
823  }
824  }
825  }
826 }
827 
828 void Character::set_bionics_from_hobbies()
829 {
830  for( const profession *profession : hobbies ) {
831  for( const bionic_id &bio : profession->CBMs() ) {
832  if( has_bionic( bio ) && !bio->dupes_allowed ) {
833  return;
834  } else {
835  add_bionic( bio );
836  }
837  }
838  }
839 }
840 
841 void Character::initialize( bool learn_recipes )
842 {
843  recalc_hp();
844 
845  if( has_trait( trait_SMELLY ) ) {
846  scent = 800;
847  }
848  if( has_trait( trait_WEAKSCENT ) ) {
849  scent = 300;
850  }
851 
852  set_wielded_item( item() );
853 
854  // Grab skills from profession and increment level
855  // We want to do this before the recipes
856  for( const profession::StartingSkill &e : prof->skills() ) {
857  mod_skill_level( e.first, e.second );
858  }
859 
860  set_skills_from_hobbies();
861 
862  // setup staring bank money
863  cash = rng( -200000, 200000 );
864  randomize_heartrate();
865 
866  //set stored kcal to a normal amount for your height
867  set_stored_kcal( get_healthy_kcal() );
868  if( has_trait( trait_XS ) ) {
869  set_stored_kcal( std::floor( get_stored_kcal() / 5 ) );
870  }
871  if( has_trait( trait_XXXL ) ) {
872  set_stored_kcal( std::floor( get_stored_kcal() * 5 ) );
873  }
874 
875  if( learn_recipes ) {
876  for( const auto &e : recipe_dict ) {
877  const recipe &r = e.second;
878  if( !r.is_practice() && !r.has_flag( flag_SECRET ) && !knows_recipe( &r ) &&
879  has_recipe_requirements( r ) ) {
880  learn_recipe( &r );
881  }
882  }
883  }
884 
885  std::vector<addiction> prof_addictions = prof->addictions();
886  for( const addiction &iter : prof_addictions ) {
887  addictions.push_back( iter );
888  }
889 
890  for( const profession *profession : hobbies ) {
891  std::vector<addiction> hobby_addictions = profession->addictions();
892  for( const addiction &iter : hobby_addictions ) {
893  addictions.push_back( iter );
894  }
895  }
896 
897  for( const bionic_id &bio : prof->CBMs() ) {
898  add_bionic( bio );
899  }
900 
901  set_bionics_from_hobbies();
902  // Adjust current energy level to maximum
903  set_power_level( get_max_power_level() );
904 
905  // Add profession proficiencies
906  for( const proficiency_id &pri : prof->proficiencies() ) {
907  add_proficiency( pri );
908  }
909 
910  // Add profession recipes
911  for( const recipe_id &id : prof->recipes() ) {
912  const recipe &r = recipe_dictionary::get_craft( id->result() );
913  learn_recipe( &r );
914  }
915 
916  // Add hobby proficiencies
917  set_proficiencies_from_hobbies();
918 
919  // Activate some mutations right from the start.
920  for( const trait_id &mut : get_mutations() ) {
921  const mutation_branch &branch = mut.obj();
922  if( branch.starts_active ) {
923  my_mutations[mut].powered = true;
924  }
925  }
926 
927  // Ensure that persistent morale effects (e.g. Optimist) are present at the start.
928  apply_persistent_morale();
929 
930  // Restart cardio accumulator
931  reset_cardio_acc();
932 
933  recalc_speed_bonus();
934 }
935 
936 void avatar::initialize( character_type type )
937 {
938  this->as_character()->initialize();
939 
940  for( const matype_id &ma : prof->ma_known() ) {
941  if( !martial_arts_data->has_martialart( ma ) ) {
942  martial_arts_data->add_martialart( ma );
943  }
944  }
945 
946  if( !prof->ma_choices().empty() ) {
947  for( int i = 0; i < prof->ma_choice_amount; i++ ) {
948  std::vector<matype_id> styles;
949  for( const matype_id &ma : prof->ma_choices() ) {
950  if( !martial_arts_data->has_martialart( ma ) ) {
951  styles.push_back( ma );
952  }
953  }
954  if( !styles.empty() ) {
955  const matype_id ma_type = choose_ma_style( type, styles, *this );
956  martial_arts_data->add_martialart( ma_type );
957  } else {
958  break;
959  }
960  }
961  }
962 
963  for( const trait_id &t : get_base_traits() ) {
964  std::vector<matype_id> styles;
965  for( const matype_id &s : t->initial_ma_styles ) {
966  if( !martial_arts_data->has_martialart( s ) ) {
967  styles.push_back( s );
968  }
969  }
970  if( !styles.empty() ) {
971  const matype_id ma_type = choose_ma_style( type, styles, *this );
972  martial_arts_data->add_martialart( ma_type );
973  }
974  }
975 
976  // Select a random known style
977  std::vector<matype_id> selectable_styles = martial_arts_data->get_known_styles( false );
978  if( !selectable_styles.empty() ) {
979  std::vector<matype_id>::iterator it_max_priority = std::max_element( selectable_styles.begin(),
980  selectable_styles.end(), []( const matype_id & a, const matype_id & b ) {
981  return a->priority < b->priority;
982  } );
983  int max_priority = ( *it_max_priority )->priority;
984  selectable_styles.erase( std::remove_if( selectable_styles.begin(),
985  selectable_styles.end(), [max_priority]( const matype_id & style ) {
986  return style->priority != max_priority;
987  } ), selectable_styles.end() );
988  }
989  martial_arts_data->set_style( random_entry( selectable_styles, style_none ) );
990 
991  for( const mtype_id &elem : prof->pets() ) {
992  starting_pets.push_back( elem );
993  }
994 
995  if( get_scenario()->vehicle() != vproto_id::NULL_ID() ) {
996  starting_vehicle = get_scenario()->vehicle();
997  } else {
998  starting_vehicle = prof->vehicle();
999  }
1000 
1001  prof->learn_spells( *this );
1002 
1003  // Also learn spells from hobbies
1004  for( const profession *profession : hobbies ) {
1005  profession->learn_spells( *this );
1006  }
1007 
1008 }

1010 static void draw_points( const catacurses::window &w, pool_type pool, const avatar &u,
1011  int netPointCost = 0 )
1012 {
1013  // Clear line (except borders)
1014  mvwprintz( w, point( 2, 3 ), c_black, std::string( getmaxx( w ) - 3, ' ' ) );
1015  mvwprintz( w, point( 2, 4 ), c_black, std::string( getmaxx( w ) - 3, ' ' ) );
1016  std::string points_msg = pools_to_string( u, pool );
1017  int pMsg_length = utf8_width( remove_color_tags( points_msg ), true );
1018  nc_color color = c_light_gray;
1019  print_colored_text( w, point( 2, 3 ), color, c_light_gray, points_msg );
1020  if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
1021  if( netPointCost > 0 ) {
1022  mvwprintz( w, point( pMsg_length + 2, 3 ), c_red, " (-%d)", std::abs( netPointCost ) );
1023  } else if( netPointCost < 0 ) {
1024  mvwprintz( w, point( pMsg_length + 2, 3 ), c_green, " (+%d)", std::abs( netPointCost ) );
1025  }
1026  }
1027  print_colored_text( w, point( 2, 4 ), color, c_light_gray,
1028  player_difficulty::getInstance().difficulty_to_string( u ) );
1029 }

1031 template <class Compare>
1032 static void draw_filter_and_sorting_indicators( const catacurses::window &w,
1033  const input_context &ctxt, const std::string_view filterstring, const Compare &sorter )
1034 {
1035  const char *const sort_order = sorter.sort_by_points ? _( "default" ) : _( "name" );
1036  const std::string sorting_indicator = string_format( "[%1$s] %2$s: %3$s",
1037  colorize( ctxt.get_desc( "SORT" ), c_green ), _( "sort" ),
1038  sort_order );
1039  const std::string filter_indicator =
1040  filterstring.empty()
1041  ? string_format( _( "[%s] filter" ), colorize( ctxt.get_desc( "FILTER" ), c_green ) )
1042  : std::string( filterstring );
1043  nc_color current_color = BORDER_COLOR;
1044  print_colored_text( w, point( 2, getmaxy( w ) - 1 ), current_color, BORDER_COLOR,
1045  string_format( "<%1s>-<%2s>", sorting_indicator, filter_indicator ) );
1046 }

1067 void set_points( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type &pool )
1068 {
1069  const int iSecondColumn = 31;
1070  const int iHeaderHeight = 6;
1071  // guessing most likely, but it doesn't matter, it will be recalculated if wrong
1072  int iHelpHeight = 3;
1073  const bool screen_reader_mode = get_option<bool>( "SCREEN_READER_MODE" );
1074 
1075  ui_adaptor ui;
1076  catacurses::window w;
1077  catacurses::window w_description;
1078  const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1079  const int freeWidth = TERMX - FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH;
1080  isWide = freeWidth > 15;
1081  w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
1082  w_description = catacurses::newwin( TERMY - iHeaderHeight - iHelpHeight - 1,
1083  TERMX - iSecondColumn - 1, point( iSecondColumn, iHeaderHeight ) );
1084  ui.position_from_window( w );
1085  };
1086  init_windows( ui );
1087  ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
1088 
1089  input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_POINTS" );
1090  tabs.set_up_tab_navigation( ctxt );
1091  ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
1092  ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1093  ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
1094 
1095  const std::string point_pool = get_option<std::string>( "CHARACTER_POINT_POOLS" );
1096 
1097  using point_limit_tuple = std::tuple<pool_type, std::string, std::string>;
1098  std::vector<point_limit_tuple> opts;
1099 
1100  const point_limit_tuple multi_pool = std::make_tuple( pool_type::MULTI_POOL,
1101  _( "Legacy: Multiple pools" ),
1102  _( "Stats, traits and skills have separate point pools.\n"
1103  "Putting stat points into traits and skills is allowed and putting trait points into skills is allowed.\n"
1104  "Scenarios and professions affect skill points.\n\n"
1105  "This is a legacy mode. Point totals are no longer balanced." ) );
1106 
1107  const point_limit_tuple one_pool = std::make_tuple( pool_type::ONE_POOL, _( "Legacy: Single pool" ),
1108  _( "Stats, traits and skills share a single point pool.\n\n"
1109  "This is a legacy mode. Point totals are no longer balanced." ) );
1110 
1111  const point_limit_tuple freeform = std::make_tuple( pool_type::FREEFORM, _( "Survivor" ),
1112  _( "No point limits are enforced, create a character with the intention of telling a story or challenging yourself." ) );
1113 
1114  if( point_pool == "multi_pool" ) {
1115  opts = { { multi_pool } };
1116  } else if( point_pool == "story_teller" ) {
1117  opts = { { freeform } };
1118  } else {
1119  opts = { { freeform, multi_pool, one_pool } };
1120  }
1121 
1122  int highlighted = 0;
1123 
1124  ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1125  const std::string help_text =
1126  ( isWide ? string_format(
1127  _( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
1128  "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> or <color_light_green>%s</color> to select pool and "
1129  "<color_light_green>%s</color> to confirm selection.\n"
1130  "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
1131  "<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to main menu." ),
1132  ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ), ctxt.get_desc( "UP" ), ctxt.get_desc( "DOWN" ),
1133  ctxt.get_desc( "CONFIRM" ), ctxt.get_desc( "NEXT_TAB" ), ctxt.get_desc( "QUIT" ) )
1134  : string_format(
1135  _( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings." ),
1136  ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ) )
1137  );
1138  const int new_iHelpHeight = foldstring( help_text, getmaxx( w ) - 4 ).size();
1139  if( new_iHelpHeight != iHelpHeight ) {
1140  iHelpHeight = new_iHelpHeight;
1141  init_windows( ui );
1142  }
1143  werase( w );
1144  tabs.draw( w );
1145 
1146  std::string title = std::get<1>( opts[highlighted] );
1147  std::string description = std::get<2>( opts[highlighted] );
1148 
1149  if( screen_reader_mode ) {
1150  // Include option title in option description, and say whether it's active
1151  if( std::get<0>( opts[highlighted] ) == pool ) {
1152  title.append( _( " - active" ) );
1153  }
1154  description = title + "\n" + description;
1155  }
1156 
1157  draw_points( w, pool, u );
1158 
1159  // Clear the bottom of the screen.
1160  werase( w_description );
1161 
1162  const int opts_length = static_cast<int>( opts.size() );
1163  for( int i = 0; i < opts_length; i++ ) {
1164  nc_color color;
1165  if( pool == std::get<0>( opts[i] ) ) {
1166  color = highlighted == i ? hilite( c_light_green ) : c_green;
1167  } else {
1168  color = highlighted == i ? COL_SELECT : c_light_gray;
1169  }
1170  const point opt_pos( 2, 6 + i );
1171  if( highlighted == i ) {
1172  ui.set_cursor( w, opt_pos );
1173  }
1174  if( screen_reader_mode ) {
1175  // The list of options only clutters up the screen in screen reader mode
1176  } else {
1177  mvwprintz( w, opt_pos, color, std::get<1>( opts[i] ) );
1178  }
1179  }
1180 
1181  fold_and_print( w_description, point_zero, getmaxx( w_description ),
1182  COL_SKILL_USED, description );
1183 
1184  // Helptext points tab
1185  fold_and_print( w, point( 2, TERMY - foldstring( help_text, getmaxx( w ) - 4 ).size() - 1 ),
1186  getmaxx( w ) - 4, COL_NOTE_MINOR, help_text );
1187  wnoutrefresh( w );
1188  wnoutrefresh( w_description );
1189  } );
1190 
1191  const int opts_length = static_cast<int>( opts.size() );
1192  do {
1193  ui_manager::redraw();
1194  const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
1195  if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
1196  break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
1197  } else if( navigate_ui_list( action, highlighted, 1, opts_length, true ) ) {
1198  } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1199  const auto &cur_opt = opts[highlighted];
1200  pool = std::get<0>( cur_opt );
1201  }
1202  } while( true );
1203 }

1357 /** Handle the stats tab of the character generation menu */
1358 void set_stats( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type pool )
1359 {
1360  // TODO: Move this out to a common header and eliminate other separate instances of these strings.
1361  static const std::array<translation, 4> stat_labels = { to_translation( "Strength" ), to_translation( "Dexterity" ), to_translation( "Intelligence" ), to_translation( "Perception" ) };
1362  const int max_stat_points = pool == pool_type::FREEFORM ? 20 : MAX_STAT;
1363  const int min_stat_points = 4;
1364 
1365  unsigned char sel = 0;
1366 
1367  const bool screen_reader_mode = get_option<bool>( "SCREEN_READER_MODE" );
1368  std::string warning_text; // Used to move warnings from the header to the details pane
1369  std::string last_stat; // Used to ensure text is read out when increasing/decreasing stats
1370 
1371  int iSecondColumn;
1372  const int iHeaderHeight = 6;
1373  // guessing most likely, but it doesn't matter, it will be recalculated if wrong
1374  int iHelpHeight = 4;
1375 
1376  ui_adaptor ui;
1377  catacurses::window w;
1378  catacurses::window w_details_pane;
1379  scrolling_text_view details( w_details_pane );
1380  bool details_recalc = true;
1381  const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1382  const int thirds = std::min( ( TERMX - 4 ) / 3, 38 ); // to allign scrollbar with the traits tab
1383  iSecondColumn = std::max( thirds, utf8_width( pools_to_string( u, pool ), true ) + 2 );
1384  const size_t iContentHeight = TERMY - iHeaderHeight - iHelpHeight - 1;
1385  w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
1386  w_details_pane = catacurses::newwin( iContentHeight, TERMX - iSecondColumn - 1,
1387  point( iSecondColumn, iHeaderHeight ) );
1388  details_recalc = true;
1389  ui.position_from_window( w );
1390  };
1391  init_windows( ui );
1392  ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
1393 
1394  input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_STATS" );
1395  tabs.set_up_tab_navigation( ctxt );
1396  details.set_up_navigation( ctxt, scrolling_key_scheme::angle_bracket_scroll );
1397  ctxt.register_cardinal();
1398  ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1399 
1400  u.reset();
1401  std::array<int *, 4> stats = { &u.str_max, &u.dex_max, &u.int_max, &u.per_max };
1402 
1403  ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1404  const std::string help_text = assemble_stat_help( ctxt );
1405  const int new_iHelpHeight = foldstring( help_text, getmaxx( w ) - 4 ).size();
1406  if( new_iHelpHeight != iHelpHeight ) {
1407  iHelpHeight = new_iHelpHeight;
1408  init_windows( ui );
1409  }
1410  werase( w );
1411  tabs.draw( w );
1412  mvwputch( w, point( iSecondColumn, iHeaderHeight - 1 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXXX ); // ''
1413  // Helptext stats tab
1414  fold_and_print( w, point( 2, TERMY - iHelpHeight - 1 ), getmaxx( w ) - 4, COL_NOTE_MINOR,
1415  help_text );
1416 
1417  const point opt_pos( 2, sel + iHeaderHeight );
1418  if( screen_reader_mode ) {
1419  // This list only clutters up the screen in screen reader mode
1420  } else {
1421  for( int i = 0; i < 4; i++ ) {
1422  mvwprintz( w, point( 2, i + iHeaderHeight ), i == sel ? COL_SELECT : c_light_gray, "%s:",
1423  stat_labels[i].translated() );
1424  mvwprintz( w, point( 16, i + iHeaderHeight ), c_light_gray, "%2d", *stats[i] );
1425  }
1426  }
1427 
1428  draw_points( w, pool, u );
1429  const point desc_line = point( iSecondColumn, 3 );
1430  warning_text = "";
1431  if( *stats[sel] <= min_stat_points ) {
1432  //~ %s - stat
1433  warning_text = string_format( _( "%s cannot be further decreased" ),
1434  stat_labels[sel].translated() );
1435  } else if( *stats[sel] >= max_stat_points ) {
1436  //~ %s - stat
1437  warning_text = string_format( _( "%s cannot be further increased" ),
1438  stat_labels[sel].translated() );
1439  } else if( *stats[sel] >= HIGH_STAT && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
1440  //~ %s - stat
1441  warning_text = string_format( _( "Increasing %s further costs 2 points" ),
1442  stat_labels[sel].translated() );
1443  }
1444  if( !warning_text.empty() && !screen_reader_mode ) {
1445  nc_color dummy = c_red;
1446  print_colored_text( w, desc_line, dummy, c_red, warning_text );
1447  }
1448 
1449  u.reset_stats();
1450  u.set_stored_kcal( u.get_healthy_kcal() );
1451  u.reset_bonuses(); // Removes pollution of stats by modifications appearing inside reset_stats(). Is reset_stats() even necessary in this context?
1452  if( details_recalc ) {
1453  std::string stat_details;
1454  if( screen_reader_mode ) {
1455  stat_details = string_format( "%s: %i\n", stat_labels[sel].translated(), *stats[sel] );
1456  if( !last_stat.empty() && !stat_details.empty() && last_stat[0] == stat_details[0] ) {
1457  // Shift the text to force the screen reader to read it
1458  stat_details = " " + stat_details;
1459  }
1460  last_stat = stat_details;
1461  if( !warning_text.empty() ) {
1462  stat_details.append( warning_text + "\n" );
1463  }
1464  stat_details.append( assemble_stat_details( u, sel ) );
1465  } else {
1466  stat_details = assemble_stat_details( u, sel );
1467  }
1468  details.set_text( stat_details );
1469  details_recalc = false;
1470  }
1471 
1472  wnoutrefresh( w );
1473  ui.set_cursor( w_details_pane, point_zero );
1474  details.draw( COL_STAT_NEUTRAL );
1475  } );
1476 
1477  do {
1478  ui_manager::redraw();
1479  const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
1480  const unsigned char id_for_curr_description = sel;
1481 
1482  if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
1483  break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
1484  } else if( details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt ) ) {
1485  // NO FURTHER ACTION REQUIRED
1486  } else if( action == "LEFT" ) {
1487  if( *stats[sel] > min_stat_points ) {
1488  ( *stats[sel] )--;
1489  details_recalc = true;
1490  }
1491  } else if( action == "RIGHT" ) {
1492  if( *stats[sel] < max_stat_points ) {
1493  ( *stats[sel] )++;
1494  details_recalc = true;
1495  }
1496  } else if( action == "DOWN" ) {
1497  sel = ( sel + 1 ) % 4;
1498  } else if( action == "UP" ) {
1499  sel = ( sel + 3 ) % 4;
1500  }
1501  if( sel != id_for_curr_description ) {
1502  details_recalc = true;
1503  }
1504  } while( true );
1505 }
1506 
1507 static struct {
1508  bool sort_by_points = false;
1509  /** @related player */
1510  bool operator()( const trait_and_var *a, const trait_and_var *b ) {
1511  return std::abs( a->trait->points ) > std::abs( b->trait->points );
1512  }
1513 } traits_sorter;
1514 
1515 static void add_trait( std::vector<trait_and_var> &to, const trait_id &trait )
1516 {
1517  if( trait->variants.empty() ) {
1518  to.emplace_back( trait, "" );
1519  return;
1520  }
1521  for( const std::pair<const std::string, mutation_variant> &var : trait->variants ) {
1522  to.emplace_back( trait, var.first );
1523  }
1524 }
1525 
1526 void set_traits( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type pool )
1527 {
1528  const int max_trait_points = get_option<int>( "MAX_TRAIT_POINTS" );
1529  const bool screen_reader_mode = get_option<bool>( "SCREEN_READER_MODE" );
1530  std::string last_trait; // Used in screen_reader_mode to ensure full trait name is read
1531  // Track how many good / bad POINTS we have; cap both at MAX_TRAIT_POINTS
1532  int num_good = 0;
1533  int num_bad = 0;
1534  // 0 -> traits that take points ( positive traits )
1535  // 1 -> traits that give points ( negative traits )
1536  // 2 -> neutral traits ( facial hair, skin color, etc )
1537  std::array<std::vector<trait_and_var>, 3> vStartingTraits;
1538 
1539  for( const mutation_branch &traits_iter : mutation_branch::get_all() ) {
1540  // Don't list blacklisted traits
1541  if( mutation_branch::trait_is_blacklisted( traits_iter.id ) ) {
1542  continue;
1543  }
1544 
1545  const std::set<trait_id> scentraits = get_scenario()->get_locked_traits();
1546  const bool is_scentrait = scentraits.find( traits_iter.id ) != scentraits.end();
1547 
1548  // Always show profession locked traits, regardless of if they are forbidden
1549  const std::vector<trait_and_var> proftraits = u.prof->get_locked_traits();
1550  auto pred = [&traits_iter]( const trait_and_var & query ) {
1551  return query.trait == traits_iter.id;
1552  };
1553  const bool is_proftrait = std::find_if( proftraits.begin(), proftraits.end(),
1554  pred ) != proftraits.end();
1555 
1556  bool is_hobby_locked_trait = false;
1557  for( const profession *hobby : u.hobbies ) {
1558  is_hobby_locked_trait = is_hobby_locked_trait || hobby->is_locked_trait( traits_iter.id );
1559  }
1560 
1561  // We show all starting traits, even if we can't pick them, to keep the interface consistent.
1562  if( traits_iter.startingtrait || get_scenario()->traitquery( traits_iter.id ) || is_proftrait ||
1563  is_hobby_locked_trait ) {
1564  if( traits_iter.points > 0 ) {
1565  add_trait( vStartingTraits[0], traits_iter.id );
1566 
1567  if( is_proftrait || is_scentrait ) {
1568  continue;
1569  }
1570 
1571  if( u.has_trait( traits_iter.id ) ) {
1572  num_good += traits_iter.points;
1573  }
1574  } else if( traits_iter.points < 0 ) {
1575  add_trait( vStartingTraits[1], traits_iter.id );
1576 
1577  if( is_proftrait || is_scentrait ) {
1578  continue;
1579  }
1580 
1581  if( u.has_trait( traits_iter.id ) ) {
1582  num_bad += traits_iter.points;
1583  }
1584  } else {
1585  add_trait( vStartingTraits[2], traits_iter.id );
1586  }
1587  }
1588  }
1589  //If the third page is empty, only use the first two.
1590  const int used_pages = vStartingTraits[2].empty() ? 2 : 3;
1591 
1592  for( auto &vStartingTrait : vStartingTraits ) {
1593  std::sort( vStartingTrait.begin(), vStartingTrait.end(), trait_display_nocolor_sort );
1594  }
1595 
1596  int iCurWorkingPage = 0;
1597  std::array<int, 3> iStartPos = { 0, 0, 0 };
1598  std::array<int, 3> iCurrentLine = { 0, 0, 0 };
1599  std::array<size_t, 3> traits_size;
1600  bool recalc_traits = false;
1601  // pointer for memory footprint reasons
1602  std::array<std::vector<const trait_and_var *>, 3> sorted_traits;
1603  std::array<scrollbar, 3> trait_sbs;
1604  std::string filterstring;
1605 
1606  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
1607  const size_t size = vStartingTraits[i].size();
1608  traits_size[i] = size;
1609  sorted_traits[i].reserve( size );
1610  for( size_t j = 0; j < size; j++ ) {
1611  sorted_traits[i].emplace_back( &vStartingTraits[i][j] );
1612  }
1613  }
1614 
1615  const int iHeaderHeight = 6;
1616  const int iDetailHeight = 3;
1617  size_t iContentHeight = 0;
1618  size_t page_width = 0;
1619 
1620  const auto pos_calc = [&]() {
1621  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
1622  // Shift start position to avoid iterating beyond end
1623  traits_size[i] = sorted_traits[i].size();
1624  int total = static_cast<int>( traits_size[i] );
1625  int height = static_cast<int>( iContentHeight );
1626  iStartPos[i] = std::min( iStartPos[i], std::max( 0, total - height ) );
1627  }
1628  };
1629 
1630  // this will return the next non empty page
1631  // there will always be at least one non-empty page
1632  // iCurWorkingPage will always be a non-empty page
1633  const auto next_avail_page = [&traits_size, &iCurWorkingPage]( bool invert_direction ) -> int {
1634  int prev_page = iCurWorkingPage < 1 ? 2 : iCurWorkingPage - 1;
1635  if( !traits_size[prev_page] )
1636  {
1637  prev_page = prev_page < 1 ? 2 : prev_page - 1;
1638  if( !traits_size[prev_page] ) {
1639  prev_page = prev_page < 1 ? 2 : prev_page - 1;
1640  }
1641  }
1642 
1643  int next_page = iCurWorkingPage > 1 ? 0 : iCurWorkingPage + 1;
1644  if( !traits_size[next_page] )
1645  {
1646  next_page = next_page > 1 ? 0 : next_page + 1;
1647  if( !traits_size[next_page] ) {
1648  next_page = next_page > 1 ? 0 : next_page + 1;
1649  }
1650  }
1651 
1652  return invert_direction ? prev_page : next_page;
1653  };
1654 
1655  ui_adaptor ui;
1656  catacurses::window w;
1657  catacurses::window w_details_pane;
1658  scrolling_text_view details( w_details_pane );
1659  bool details_recalc = true;
1660  const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1661  w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
1662  w_details_pane = catacurses::newwin( iDetailHeight, TERMX - 1,
1663  point( 0, TERMY - iDetailHeight - 1 ) );
1664  ui.position_from_window( w );
1665  page_width = std::min( ( TERMX - 4 ) / used_pages, 38 );
1666  iContentHeight = TERMY - iHeaderHeight - iDetailHeight - 1;
1667 
1668  details_recalc = true;
1669  pos_calc();
1670  };
1671  init_windows( ui );
1672  ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
1673 
1674  input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_TRAITS" );
1675  tabs.set_up_tab_navigation( ctxt );
1676  details.set_up_navigation( ctxt, scrolling_key_scheme::angle_bracket_scroll );
1677  for( scrollbar &sb : trait_sbs ) {
1678  sb.set_draggable( ctxt );
1679  }
1680  ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
1681  ctxt.register_leftright();
1682  ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
1683  ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
1684  ctxt.register_action( "FILTER" );
1685  ctxt.register_action( "RESET_FILTER" );
1686  ctxt.register_action( "SORT" );
1687 
1688  ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
1689  werase( w );
1690 
1691  tabs.draw( w );
1692  for( int i = 1; i < 3; ++i ) {
1693  mvwputch( w, point( i * page_width, iHeaderHeight - 1 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXXX ); // ''
1694  }
1695  draw_filter_and_sorting_indicators( w, ctxt, filterstring, traits_sorter );
1696  draw_points( w, pool, u );
1697  int full_string_length = 0;
1698  const int remaining_points_length = utf8_width( pools_to_string( u, pool ), true );
1699  if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
1700  std::string full_string =
1701  string_format( "<color_light_green>%2d/%-2d</color> <color_light_red>%3d/-%-2d</color>",
1702  num_good, max_trait_points, num_bad, max_trait_points );
1703  fold_and_print( w, point( remaining_points_length + 3, 3 ), getmaxx( w ) - 2, c_white,
1704  full_string );
1705  full_string_length = utf8_width( full_string, true ) + remaining_points_length + 3;
1706  } else {
1707  full_string_length = remaining_points_length + 3;
1708  }
1709 
1710  for( int iCurrentPage = 0; iCurrentPage < 3; iCurrentPage++ ) {
1711  nc_color col_on_act;
1712  nc_color col_off_act;
1713  nc_color col_on_pas;
1714  nc_color col_off_pas;
1715  nc_color col_tr;
1716  switch( iCurrentPage ) {
1717  case 0:
1718  col_on_act = COL_TR_GOOD_ON_ACT;
1719  col_off_act = COL_TR_GOOD_OFF_ACT;
1720  col_on_pas = COL_TR_GOOD_ON_PAS;
1721  col_off_pas = COL_TR_GOOD_OFF_PAS;
1722  col_tr = COL_TR_GOOD;
1723  break;
1724  case 1:
1725  col_on_act = COL_TR_BAD_ON_ACT;
1726  col_off_act = COL_TR_BAD_OFF_ACT;
1727  col_on_pas = COL_TR_BAD_ON_PAS;
1728  col_off_pas = COL_TR_BAD_OFF_PAS;
1729  col_tr = COL_TR_BAD;
1730  break;
1731  default:
1732  col_on_act = COL_TR_NEUT_ON_ACT;
1733  col_off_act = COL_TR_NEUT_OFF_ACT;
1734  col_on_pas = COL_TR_NEUT_ON_PAS;
1735  col_off_pas = COL_TR_NEUT_OFF_PAS;
1736  col_tr = COL_TR_NEUT;
1737  break;
1738  }
1739  nc_color hi_on = hilite( col_on_act );
1740  nc_color hi_off = hilite( c_white );
1741 
1742  int &start = iStartPos[iCurrentPage];
1743  int current = iCurrentLine[iCurrentPage];
1744  calcStartPos( start, current, iContentHeight, traits_size[iCurrentPage] );
1745  int end = start + static_cast<int>( std::min( traits_size[iCurrentPage], iContentHeight ) );
1746 
1747  for( int i = start; i < end; i++ ) {
1748  const trait_and_var &cursor = *sorted_traits[iCurrentPage][i];
1749  const trait_id &cur_trait = cursor.trait;
1750  if( current == i && iCurrentPage == iCurWorkingPage ) {
1751  int points = cur_trait->points;
1752  bool negativeTrait = points < 0;
1753  if( negativeTrait ) {
1754  points *= -1;
1755  }
1756  if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
1757  mvwprintz( w, point( full_string_length + 3, 3 ), col_tr,
1758  n_gettext( "%s %s %d point", "%s %s %d points", points ),
1759  cursor.name(),
1760  negativeTrait ? _( "earns" ) : _( "costs" ),
1761  points );
1762  }
1763  }
1764 
1765  nc_color cLine = col_off_pas;
1766  if( iCurWorkingPage == iCurrentPage ) {
1767  cLine = col_off_act;
1768  if( current == i ) {
1769  cLine = hi_off;
1770  if( u.has_conflicting_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1771  cLine = hilite( c_dark_gray );
1772  } else if( u.has_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1773  if( !cur_trait->variants.empty() && !u.has_trait_variant( cursor ) ) {
1774  cLine = hilite( c_dark_gray );
1775  } else {
1776  cLine = hi_on;
1777  }
1778  }
1779  } else {
1780  if( u.has_conflicting_trait( cur_trait ) || get_scenario()->is_forbidden_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1781  cLine = c_dark_gray;
1782 
1783  } else if( u.has_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1784  if( !cur_trait->variants.empty() && !u.has_trait_variant( cursor ) ) {
1785  cLine = c_dark_gray;
1786  } else {
1787  cLine = col_on_act;
1788  }
1789  }
1790  }
1791  } else if( u.has_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1792  cLine = col_on_pas;
1793 
1794  } else if( u.has_conflicting_trait( cur_trait ) ||
1795  get_scenario()->is_forbidden_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1796  cLine = c_light_gray;
1797  }
1798 
1799  const int cur_line_y = iHeaderHeight + i - start;
1800  const int cur_line_x = 2 + iCurrentPage * page_width;
1801  const point opt_pos( cur_line_x, cur_line_y );
1802  if( screen_reader_mode ) {
1803  // This list only clutters up the screen in screen reader mode
1804  } else {
1805  mvwprintz( w, opt_pos, cLine,
1806  utf8_truncate( cursor.name(), page_width - 2 ) );
1807  }
1808  }
1809 
1810  if( details_recalc ) {
1811  std::string description;
1812  const trait_and_var &current = *sorted_traits[iCurWorkingPage][iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage]];
1813  if( screen_reader_mode ) {
1814  /* Screen readers will skip over text that has not changed. Since the lists of traits are
1815  * alphabetical, this frequently results in letters/words being skipped. So, if the screen
1816  * reader is likely to skip over part of a trait name, we trick it into thinking things have
1817  * changed by shifting the text slightly.
1818  */
1819  if( !last_trait.empty() && last_trait[0] == current.name()[0] ) {
1820  description = " " + current.name();
1821  } else {
1822  description = current.name();
1823  }
1824  last_trait = description;
1825 
1826  std::string cur_trait_notes;
1827  if( u.has_conflicting_trait( current.trait ) ) {
1828  cur_trait_notes = _( "a conflicting trait is active" );
1829  } else if( u.has_trait( current.trait ) ) {
1830  if( !current.trait->variants.empty() && !u.has_trait_variant( current ) ) {
1831  cur_trait_notes = _( "a different variant of this trait is active" );
1832  } else {
1833  cur_trait_notes = _( "active" );
1834  }
1835  }
1836 
1837  if( !cur_trait_notes.empty() ) {
1838  description.append( string_format( " - %s", cur_trait_notes ) );
1839  }
1840 
1841  description.append( "\n" + current.desc() );
1842  } else {
1843  description = current.desc();
1844  }
1845  details.set_text( colorize( description, col_tr ) );
1846  details_recalc = false;
1847  }
1848 
1849  trait_sbs[iCurrentPage].offset_x( page_width * iCurrentPage )
1850  .offset_y( iHeaderHeight )
1851  .content_size( traits_size[iCurrentPage] )
1852  .viewport_pos( start )
1853  .viewport_size( iContentHeight )
1854  .apply( w );
1855  }
1856 
1857  wnoutrefresh( w );
1858  ui.set_cursor( w_details_pane, point_zero );
1859  // color is never visible (COL_TR_NEUT), text is already colorized
1860  details.draw( COL_TR_NEUT );
1861  } );
1862 
1863  do {
1864  if( recalc_traits ) {
1865  for( int i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
1866  const size_t size = vStartingTraits[i].size();
1867  sorted_traits[i].clear();
1868  for( size_t j = 0; j < size; j++ ) {
1869  sorted_traits[i].emplace_back( &vStartingTraits[i][j] );
1870  }
1871  }
1872 
1873  if( !filterstring.empty() ) {
1874  for( std::vector<const trait_and_var *> &traits : sorted_traits ) {
1875  const auto new_end_iter = std::remove_if(
1876  traits.begin(),
1877  traits.end(),
1878  [&filterstring]( const trait_and_var * trait ) {
1879  return !lcmatch( trait->name(), filterstring );
1880  } );
1881 
1882  traits.erase( new_end_iter, traits.end() );
1883  }
1884  }
1885 
1886  if( !filterstring.empty() && sorted_traits[0].empty() && sorted_traits[1].empty() &&
1887  sorted_traits[2].empty() ) {
1888  popup( _( "Nothing found." ) ); // another case of black box in tiles
1889  filterstring.clear();
1890  continue;
1891  }
1892 
1893  if( traits_sorter.sort_by_points ) {
1894  std::stable_sort( sorted_traits[0].begin(), sorted_traits[0].end(), traits_sorter );
1895  std::stable_sort( sorted_traits[1].begin(), sorted_traits[1].end(), traits_sorter );
1896  }
1897 
1898  // Select the current page, if not empty
1899  // There should always be at least one not empty page
1900  iCurrentLine[0] = 0;
1901  iCurrentLine[1] = 0;
1902  iCurrentLine[2] = 0;
1903  if( sorted_traits[iCurWorkingPage].empty() ) {
1904  iCurWorkingPage = 0;
1905  if( !sorted_traits[0].empty() ) {
1906  iCurWorkingPage = 0;
1907  } else if( !sorted_traits[1].empty() ) {
1908  iCurWorkingPage = 1;
1909  } else if( !sorted_traits[2].empty() ) {
1910  iCurWorkingPage = 2;
1911  }
1912  }
1913 
1914  pos_calc();
1915  recalc_traits = false;
1916  }
1917 
1918  ui_manager::redraw();
1919  const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
1920  std::array< int, 3> cur_sb_pos = iStartPos;
1921  bool scrollbar_handled = false;
1922  const int iPrevWorkingPage = iCurWorkingPage;
1923  const int iPrevLine = iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage];
1924  for( int i = 0; i < static_cast<int>( trait_sbs.size() ); ++i ) {
1925  if( trait_sbs[i].handle_dragging( action, ctxt.get_coordinates_text( catacurses::stdscr ),
1926  cur_sb_pos[i] ) ) {
1927  if( cur_sb_pos[i] != iStartPos[i] ) {
1928  iStartPos[i] = cur_sb_pos[i];
1929  iCurrentLine[i] = iStartPos[i] + ( iContentHeight - 1 ) / 2;
1930  }
1931  scrollbar_handled = true;
1932  }
1933  }
1934 
1935  if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
1936  break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
1937  } else if( action == "LEFT" || action == "RIGHT" ) {
1938  iCurWorkingPage = next_avail_page( action == "LEFT" );
1939  } else if( scrollbar_handled
1940  || details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt )
1941  || navigate_ui_list( action, iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage], 10,
1942  traits_size[iCurWorkingPage], true ) ) {
1943  // No additional action required
1944  } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
1945  int inc_type = 0;
1946  const trait_id cur_trait = sorted_traits[iCurWorkingPage][iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage]]->trait;
1947  const std::string variant = sorted_traits[iCurWorkingPage][iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage]]->variant;
1948  const mutation_branch &mdata = cur_trait.obj();
1949 
1950  // Look through the profession bionics, and see if any of them conflict with this trait
1951  std::vector<bionic_id> cbms_blocking_trait = bionics_cancelling_trait( u.prof->CBMs(), cur_trait );
1952  const std::unordered_set<trait_id> conflicting_traits = u.get_conflicting_traits( cur_trait );
1953 
1954  if( u.has_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1955 
1956  inc_type = -1;
1957 
1958  if( get_scenario()->is_locked_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1959  inc_type = 0;
1960  popup( _( "Your scenario of %s prevents you from removing this trait." ),
1961  get_scenario()->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1962  } else if( u.prof->is_locked_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1963  inc_type = 0;
1964  popup( _( "Your profession of %s prevents you from removing this trait." ),
1965  u.prof->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1966  }
1967  for( const profession *hobbies : u.hobbies ) {
1968  if( hobbies->is_locked_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1969  inc_type = 0;
1970  popup( _( "Your background of %s prevents you from removing this trait." ),
1971  hobbies->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1972  }
1973  }
1974  // Switch variant
1975  if( !u.has_trait_variant( trait_and_var( cur_trait, variant ) ) ) {
1976  u.set_mut_variant( cur_trait, cur_trait->variant( variant ) );
1977  inc_type = 0;
1978  details_recalc = true;
1979  }
1980  } else if( !conflicting_traits.empty() ) {
1981  std::vector<std::string> conflict_names;
1982  conflict_names.reserve( conflicting_traits.size() );
1983  for( const trait_id &trait : conflicting_traits ) {
1984  conflict_names.emplace_back( u.mutation_name( trait ) );
1985  }
1986  popup( _( "You already picked some conflicting traits: %s." ),
1987  enumerate_as_string( conflict_names ) );
1988  } else if( get_scenario()->is_forbidden_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1989  popup( _( "The scenario you picked prevents you from taking this trait!" ) );
1990  } else if( u.prof->is_forbidden_trait( cur_trait ) ) {
1991  popup( _( "Your profession of %s prevents you from taking this trait." ),
1992  u.prof->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
1993  } else if( !cbms_blocking_trait.empty() ) {
1994  // Grab a list of the names of the bionics that block this trait
1995  // So that the player know what is preventing them from taking it
1996  std::vector<std::string> conflict_names;
1997  conflict_names.reserve( cbms_blocking_trait.size() );
1998  for( const bionic_id &conflict : cbms_blocking_trait ) {
1999  conflict_names.emplace_back( conflict->name.translated() );
2000  }
2001  popup( _( "The following bionics prevent you from taking this trait: %s." ),
2002  enumerate_as_string( conflict_names ) );
2003  } else if( iCurWorkingPage == 0 && num_good + mdata.points >
2004  max_trait_points && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
2005  popup( n_gettext( "Sorry, but you can only take %d point of advantages.",
2006  "Sorry, but you can only take %d points of advantages.", max_trait_points ),
2007  max_trait_points );
2008 
2009  } else if( iCurWorkingPage != 0 && num_bad + mdata.points <
2010  -max_trait_points && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
2011  popup( n_gettext( "Sorry, but you can only take %d point of disadvantages.",
2012  "Sorry, but you can only take %d points of disadvantages.", max_trait_points ),
2013  max_trait_points );
2014 
2015  } else {
2016  inc_type = 1;
2017  }
2018 
2019  //inc_type is either -1 or 1, so we can just multiply by it to invert
2020  if( inc_type != 0 ) {
2021  details_recalc = true;
2022  u.toggle_trait_deps( cur_trait, variant );
2023  if( iCurWorkingPage == 0 ) {
2024  num_good += mdata.points * inc_type;
2025  } else {
2026  num_bad += mdata.points * inc_type;
2027  }
2028  }
2029  } else if( action == "SORT" ) {
2030  traits_sorter.sort_by_points = !traits_sorter.sort_by_points;
2031  recalc_traits = true;
2032  } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
2033  string_input_popup()
2034  .title( _( "Search:" ) )
2035  .width( 10 )
2036  .description( _( "Search by trait name." ) )
2037  .edit( filterstring );
2038  recalc_traits = true;
2039  } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
2040  if( !filterstring.empty() ) {
2041  filterstring.clear();
2042  recalc_traits = true;
2043  }
2044  }
2045  if( iCurWorkingPage != iPrevWorkingPage || iCurrentLine[iCurWorkingPage] != iPrevLine ) {
2046  details_recalc = true;
2047  }
2048  } while( true );
2049 }
2050 
2051 static struct {
2052  bool sort_by_points = true;
2053  bool male = false;
2054  /** @related player */
2055  bool operator()( const string_id<profession> &a, const string_id<profession> &b ) const {
2056  // The generic ("Unemployed") profession should be listed first.
2057  const profession *gen = profession::generic();
2058  if( &b.obj() == gen ) {
2059  return false;
2060  } else if( &a.obj() == gen ) {
2061  return true;
2062  }
2063 
2064  if( !a->can_pick().success() && b->can_pick().success() ) {
2065  return false;
2066  }
2067 
2068  if( a->can_pick().success() && !b->can_pick().success() ) {
2069  return true;
2070  }
2071 
2072  if( sort_by_points ) {
2073  return a->point_cost() < b->point_cost();
2074  } else {
2075  return localized_compare( a->gender_appropriate_name( male ),
2076  b->gender_appropriate_name( male ) );
2077  }
2078  }
2079 } profession_sorter;
2080 
2081 static std::string assemble_profession_details( const avatar &u, const input_context &ctxt,
2082  const std::vector<string_id<profession>> &sorted_profs, const int cur_id, const std::string &notes )
2083 {
2084  std::string assembled;
2085 
2086  // Display Origin
2087  const std::string mod_src = enumerate_as_string( sorted_profs[cur_id]->src, [](
2088  const std::pair<profession_id, mod_id> &source ) {
2089  return string_format( "'%s'", source.second->name() );
2090  }, enumeration_conjunction::arrow );
2091  assembled += string_format( _( "Origin: %s" ), mod_src ) + "\n";
2092 
2093  std::string profession_name = sorted_profs[cur_id]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male );
2094  if( get_option<bool>( "SCREEN_READER_MODE" ) && !notes.empty() ) {
2095  profession_name = profession_name.append( string_format( " - %s", notes ) );
2096  }
2097  assembled += string_format( g_switch_msg( u ), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_GENDER" ),
2098  profession_name ) + "\n";
2099  assembled += string_format( dress_switch_msg(), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) ) + "\n";
2100 
2101  if( sorted_profs[cur_id]->get_requirement().has_value() ) {
2102  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession requirements:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2103  assembled += string_format( _( "Complete \"%s\"\n" ),
2104  sorted_profs[cur_id]->get_requirement().value()->name() );
2105  }
2106  //Profession story
2107  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession story:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2108  if( !sorted_profs[cur_id]->can_pick().success() ) {
2109  assembled += colorize( sorted_profs[cur_id]->can_pick().str(), c_red ) + "\n";
2110  }
2111  assembled += colorize( sorted_profs[cur_id]->description( u.male ), c_green ) + "\n";
2112 
2113  // Profession addictions
2114  const auto prof_addictions = sorted_profs[cur_id]->addictions();
2115  if( !prof_addictions.empty() ) {
2116  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession addictions:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2117  for( const addiction &a : prof_addictions ) {
2118  const char *format = pgettext( "set_profession_addictions", "%1$s (%2$d)" );
2119  assembled += string_format( format, a.type->get_name().translated(), a.intensity ) + "\n";
2120  }
2121  }
2122 
2123  // Profession traits
2124  const auto prof_traits = sorted_profs[cur_id]->get_locked_traits();
2125  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession traits:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2126  if( prof_traits.empty() ) {
2127  assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_trait", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2128  } else {
2129  for( const trait_and_var &t : prof_traits ) {
2130  assembled += t.name() + "\n";
2131  }
2132  }
2133 
2134  // Profession martial art styles
2135  const auto prof_ma_known = sorted_profs[cur_id]->ma_known();
2136  const auto prof_ma_choices = sorted_profs[cur_id]->ma_choices();
2137  int ma_amount = sorted_profs[cur_id]->ma_choice_amount;
2138  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession martial arts:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2139  if( prof_ma_known.empty() && prof_ma_choices.empty() ) {
2140  assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_ma", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2141  } else {
2142  if( !prof_ma_known.empty() ) {
2143  assembled += colorize( _( "Known:" ), c_cyan ) + "\n";
2144  for( const matype_id &ma : prof_ma_known ) {
2145  const martialart &style = ma.obj();
2146  assembled += style.name.translated() + "\n";
2147  }
2148  }
2149  if( !prof_ma_known.empty() && !prof_ma_choices.empty() ) {
2150  assembled += "\n";
2151  }
2152  if( !prof_ma_choices.empty() ) {
2153  assembled += colorize( string_format( _( "Choose %d:" ), ma_amount ), c_cyan ) + "\n";
2154  for( const matype_id &ma : prof_ma_choices ) {
2155  const martialart &style = ma.obj();
2156  assembled += style.name.translated() + "\n";
2157  }
2158  }
2159  }
2160 
2161  // Profession skills
2162  const profession::StartingSkillList prof_skills = sorted_profs[cur_id]->skills();
2163  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession skills:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2164  if( prof_skills.empty() ) {
2165  assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2166  } else {
2167  for( const auto &sl : prof_skills ) {
2168  const char *format = pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "%1$s (%2$d)" );
2169  assembled += string_format( format, sl.first.obj().name(), sl.second ) + "\n";
2170  }
2171  }
2172 
2173  // Profession items
2174  const auto prof_items = sorted_profs[cur_id]->items( outfit, u.get_mutations() );
2175  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession items:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2176  if( prof_items.empty() ) {
2177  assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_item", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2178  } else {
2179  // TODO: If the item group is randomized *at all*, these will be different each time
2180  // and it won't match what you actually start with
2181  // TODO: Put like items together like the inventory does, so we don't have to scroll
2182  // through a list of a dozen forks.
2183  std::string assembled_wielded;
2184  std::string assembled_worn;
2185  std::string assembled_inventory;
2186  for( const item &it : prof_items ) {
2187  if( it.has_flag( json_flag_no_auto_equip ) ) { // NOLINT(bugprone-branch-clone)
2188  assembled_inventory += it.display_name() + "\n";
2189  } else if( it.has_flag( json_flag_auto_wield ) ) {
2190  assembled_wielded += it.display_name() + "\n";
2191  } else if( it.is_armor() ) {
2192  assembled_worn += it.display_name() + "\n";
2193  } else {
2194  assembled_inventory += it.display_name() + "\n";
2195  }
2196  }
2197  assembled += colorize( _( "Wielded:" ), c_cyan ) + "\n";
2198  assembled += !assembled_wielded.empty() ? assembled_wielded :
2199  pgettext( "set_profession_item_wielded",
2200  "None\n" );
2201  assembled += colorize( _( "Worn:" ), c_cyan ) + "\n";
2202  assembled += !assembled_worn.empty() ? assembled_worn : pgettext( "set_profession_item_worn",
2203  "None\n" );
2204  assembled += colorize( _( "Inventory:" ), c_cyan ) + "\n";
2205  assembled += !assembled_inventory.empty() ? assembled_inventory :
2206  pgettext( "set_profession_item_inventory",
2207  "None\n" );
2208  }
2209 
2210  // Profession bionics, active bionics shown first
2211  auto prof_CBMs = sorted_profs[cur_id]->CBMs();
2212 
2213  if( !prof_CBMs.empty() ) {
2214  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession bionics:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2215  std::sort( std::begin( prof_CBMs ), std::end( prof_CBMs ), []( const bionic_id & a,
2216  const bionic_id & b ) {
2217  return a->activated && !b->activated;
2218  } );
2219  for( const auto &b : prof_CBMs ) {
2220  const bionic_data &cbm = b.obj();
2221  if( cbm.activated && cbm.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_TOGGLED ) ) {
2222  assembled += string_format( _( "%s (toggled)" ), cbm.name ) + "\n";
2223  } else if( cbm.activated ) {
2224  assembled += string_format( _( "%s (activated)" ), cbm.name ) + "\n";
2225  } else {
2226  assembled += cbm.name + "\n";
2227  }
2228  }
2229  }
2230  // Proficiencies
2231  std::vector<proficiency_id> prof_proficiencies = sorted_profs[cur_id]->proficiencies();
2232  if( !prof_proficiencies.empty() ) {
2233  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession proficiencies:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2234  for( const proficiency_id &prof : prof_proficiencies ) {
2235  assembled += prof->name() + "\n";
2236  }
2237  }
2238  // Recipes
2239  std::vector<recipe_id> prof_recipe = sorted_profs[cur_id]->recipes();
2240  if( !prof_recipe.empty() ) {
2241  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession recipes:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2242  for( const recipe_id &prof : prof_recipe ) {
2243  assembled += prof->result_name() + "\n";
2244  }
2245  }
2246  // Profession pet
2247  if( !sorted_profs[cur_id]->pets().empty() ) {
2248  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession pets:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2249  for( const auto &elem : sorted_profs[cur_id]->pets() ) {
2250  monster mon( elem );
2251  assembled += mon.get_name() + "\n";
2252  }
2253  }
2254  // Profession vehicle
2255  if( sorted_profs[cur_id]->vehicle() ) {
2256  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession vehicle:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2257  vproto_id veh_id = sorted_profs[cur_id]->vehicle();
2258  assembled += veh_id->name.translated() + "\n";
2259  }
2260  // Profession spells
2261  if( !sorted_profs[cur_id]->spells().empty() ) {
2262  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession spells:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2263  for( const std::pair<spell_id, int> spell_pair : sorted_profs[cur_id]->spells() ) {
2264  assembled += string_format( _( "%s level %d" ), spell_pair.first->name, spell_pair.second ) + "\n";
2265  }
2266  }
2267  // Profession missions
2268  if( !sorted_profs[cur_id]->missions().empty() ) {
2269  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Profession missions:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2270  for( mission_type_id mission_id : sorted_profs[cur_id]->missions() ) {
2271  assembled += mission_type::get( mission_id )->tname() + "\n";
2272  }
2273  }
2274  return assembled;
2275 }
2276 
2277 /** Helper to filter and move the cursor in the hobby/profession lists */
2278 template<typename T, typename S>
2279 size_t filter_entries( avatar &u, int &cur_id, std::vector<T> &old_entries,
2280  std::vector<T> &new_entries, T chosen_entry,
2281  std::string filterstring, S sorter )
2282 {
2283  T previously_highlighted = old_entries.empty() ? T() : old_entries[cur_id];
2284 
2285  old_entries = new_entries;
2286 
2287  // Filter the list of entries
2288  const auto new_end = std::remove_if( old_entries.begin(),
2289  old_entries.end(), [&]( const T & arg ) {
2290  return !lcmatch( arg->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ), filterstring );
2291  } );
2292  old_entries.erase( new_end, old_entries.end() );
2293 
2294  if( old_entries.empty() ) {
2295  popup( _( "Nothing found." ) ); // another case of black box in tiles
2296  return 0; // tell caller to try again without a filterstring
2297  }
2298 
2299  int entries_length = old_entries.size();
2300 
2301  std::stable_sort( old_entries.begin(), old_entries.end(), sorter );
2302 
2303  bool match = false;
2304 
2305  // Put the cursor on the previously highlighted entry, if possible.
2306  for( int i = 0; i < entries_length; ++i ) {
2307  if( old_entries[i] == previously_highlighted ) {
2308  cur_id = i;
2309  match = true;
2310  break;
2311  }
2312  }
2313 
2314  if( !match ) {
2315  // Pur the cursor on the currently chosen entry, if possible.
2316  for( int i = 0; i < entries_length; ++i ) {
2317  if( old_entries[i] == chosen_entry ) {
2318  cur_id = i;
2319  match = true;
2320  break;
2321  }
2322  }
2323  }
2324 
2325  if( !match ) {
2326  cur_id = 0;
2327  }
2328 
2329  return old_entries.size();
2330 }
