2332 /** Handle the profession tab of the character generation menu */
2333 void set_profession( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type pool )
2334 {
2335  int cur_id = 0;
2336  size_t iContentHeight = 0;
2337  int iStartPos = 0;
2338 
2339  const bool screen_reader_mode = get_option<bool>( "SCREEN_READER_MODE" );
2340 
2341  ui_adaptor ui;
2342  catacurses::window w;
2343  catacurses::window w_details_pane;
2344  scrolling_text_view details( w_details_pane );
2345  bool details_recalc = true;
2346  const int iHeaderHeight = 6;
2347  scrollbar list_sb;
2348  const auto init_windows = [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2349  iContentHeight = TERMY - iHeaderHeight - 1;
2350  w = catacurses::newwin( TERMY, TERMX, point_zero );
2351  w_details_pane = catacurses::newwin( iContentHeight, TERMX / 2 - 1, point( TERMX / 2,
2352  iHeaderHeight ) );
2353  details_recalc = true;
2354  ui.position_from_window( w );
2355  };
2356  init_windows( ui );
2357  ui.on_screen_resize( init_windows );
2358 
2359  input_context ctxt( "NEW_CHAR_PROFESSIONS" );
2360  tabs.set_up_tab_navigation( ctxt );
2361  details.set_up_navigation( ctxt, scrolling_key_scheme::angle_bracket_scroll );
2362  list_sb.set_draggable( ctxt );
2363  ctxt.register_navigate_ui_list();
2364  ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
2365  ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_GENDER" );
2366  ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" );
2367  ctxt.register_action( "SORT" );
2368  ctxt.register_action( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" );
2369  ctxt.register_action( "FILTER" );
2370  ctxt.register_action( "RESET_FILTER" );
2371  ctxt.register_action( "RANDOMIZE" );
2372 
2373  bool recalc_profs = true;
2374  size_t profs_length = 0;
2375  std::string filterstring;
2376  std::vector<string_id<profession>> sorted_profs;
2377 
2378  ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
2379  werase( w );
2380  tabs.draw( w );
2381  mvwputch( w, point( TERMX / 2, iHeaderHeight - 1 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXXX ); // ''
2382  mvwputch( w, point( TERMX / 2, TERMY - 1 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XXOX ); // ''
2383  draw_filter_and_sorting_indicators( w, ctxt, filterstring, profession_sorter );
2384 
2385  const bool cur_id_is_valid = cur_id >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( cur_id ) < sorted_profs.size();
2386  if( cur_id_is_valid ) {
2387  int netPointCost = sorted_profs[cur_id]->point_cost() - u.prof->point_cost();
2388  ret_val<void> can_afford = sorted_profs[cur_id]->can_afford( u, skill_points_left( u, pool ) );
2389  ret_val<void> can_pick = sorted_profs[cur_id]->can_pick();
2390  int pointsForProf = sorted_profs[cur_id]->point_cost();
2391  bool negativeProf = pointsForProf < 0;
2392  if( negativeProf ) {
2393  pointsForProf *= -1;
2394  }
2395 
2396  // Draw header.
2397  draw_points( w, pool, u, netPointCost );
2398  if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
2399  const char *prof_msg_temp;
2400  if( negativeProf ) {
2401  //~ 1s - profession name, 2d - current character points.
2402  prof_msg_temp = n_gettext( "Profession %1$s earns %2$d point",
2403  "Profession %1$s earns %2$d points",
2404  pointsForProf );
2405  } else {
2406  //~ 1s - profession name, 2d - current character points.
2407  prof_msg_temp = n_gettext( "Profession %1$s costs %2$d point",
2408  "Profession %1$s costs %2$d points",
2409  pointsForProf );
2410  }
2411 
2412  int pMsg_length = utf8_width( remove_color_tags( pools_to_string( u, pool ) ) );
2413  mvwprintz( w, point( pMsg_length + 9, 3 ), can_afford.success() ? c_green : c_light_red,
2414  prof_msg_temp, sorted_profs[cur_id]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ), pointsForProf );
2415  }
2416  }
2417 
2418  //Draw options
2419  calcStartPos( iStartPos, cur_id, iContentHeight, profs_length );
2420  const int end_pos = iStartPos + std::min( iContentHeight, profs_length );
2421  std::string cur_prof_notes;
2422  for( int i = iStartPos; i < end_pos; i++ ) {
2423  nc_color col;
2424  if( u.prof != &sorted_profs[i].obj() ) {
2425 
2426  if( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_profs[i] == sorted_profs[cur_id] &&
2427  !sorted_profs[i]->can_pick().success() ) {
2428  col = h_dark_gray;
2429  if( i == cur_id ) {
2430  cur_prof_notes = _( "unavailable" );
2431  }
2432  } else if( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_profs[i] != sorted_profs[cur_id] &&
2433  !sorted_profs[i]->can_pick().success() ) {
2434  col = c_dark_gray;
2435  if( i == cur_id ) {
2436  cur_prof_notes = _( "unavailable" );
2437  }
2438  } else {
2439  col = ( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_profs[i] == sorted_profs[cur_id] ? COL_SELECT : c_light_gray );
2440  }
2441  } else {
2442  col = ( cur_id_is_valid &&
2443  sorted_profs[i] == sorted_profs[cur_id] ? hilite( c_light_green ) : COL_SKILL_USED );
2444  if( i == cur_id ) {
2445  cur_prof_notes = _( "active" );
2446  }
2447  }
2448  if( screen_reader_mode ) {
2449  // This list only clutters up the screen in screen reader mode
2450  } else {
2451  const point opt_pos( 2, iHeaderHeight + i - iStartPos );
2452  mvwprintz( w, opt_pos, col,
2453  sorted_profs[i]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
2454  }
2455  }
2456 
2457  if( details_recalc && cur_id_is_valid ) {
2458  details.set_text( assemble_profession_details( u, ctxt, sorted_profs, cur_id, cur_prof_notes ) );
2459  details_recalc = false;
2460  }
2461 
2462  list_sb.offset_x( 0 )
2463  .offset_y( iHeaderHeight )
2464  .content_size( profs_length )
2465  .viewport_pos( iStartPos )
2466  .viewport_size( iContentHeight )
2467  .apply( w );
2468 
2469  wnoutrefresh( w );
2470  ui.set_cursor( w_details_pane, point_zero );
2471  details.draw( c_light_gray );
2472  } );
2473 
2474  do {
2475  if( recalc_profs ) {
2476  std::vector<profession_id> new_profs = get_scenario()->permitted_professions();
2477  profession_sorter.male = u.male;
2478  if( ( profs_length = filter_entries( u, cur_id, sorted_profs, new_profs, u.prof->ident(),
2479  filterstring,
2480  profession_sorter ) ) == 0 ) {
2481  filterstring.clear();
2482  continue;
2483  }
2484  recalc_profs = false;
2485  }
2486 
2487  ui_manager::redraw();
2488  const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
2489  const int recmax = profs_length;
2490  const int scroll_rate = recmax > 20 ? 10 : 2;
2491  const int id_for_curr_description = cur_id;
2492  int scrollbar_pos = iStartPos;
2493 
2494  if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
2495  break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
2496  } else if( details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt )
2497  || navigate_ui_list( action, cur_id, scroll_rate, recmax, true ) ) {
2498  // NO FURTHER ACTION REQUIRED
2499  } else if( list_sb.handle_dragging( action, ctxt.get_coordinates_text( catacurses::stdscr ),
2500  scrollbar_pos ) ) {
2501  if( scrollbar_pos != iStartPos ) {
2502  iStartPos = scrollbar_pos;
2503  cur_id = iStartPos + ( iContentHeight - 1 ) / 2;
2504  }
2505  } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
2506  ret_val<void> can_pick = sorted_profs[cur_id]->can_pick();
2507 
2508  if( !can_pick.success() ) {
2509  popup( can_pick.str() );
2510  continue;
2511  }
2512 
2513  // Selecting a profession will, under certain circumstances, change the detail text
2514  details_recalc = true;
2515 
2516  // Remove traits from the previous profession
2517  for( const trait_and_var &old : u.prof->get_locked_traits() ) {
2518  u.toggle_trait_deps( old.trait );
2519  }
2520 
2521  u.prof = &sorted_profs[cur_id].obj();
2522 
2523  // Remove pre-selected traits that conflict
2524  // with the new profession's traits
2525  for( const trait_and_var &new_trait : u.prof->get_locked_traits() ) {
2526  if( u.has_conflicting_trait( new_trait.trait ) ) {
2527  for( const trait_id &suspect_trait : u.get_mutations() ) {
2528  if( are_conflicting_traits( new_trait.trait, suspect_trait ) ) {
2529  popup( _( "Your trait %1$s has been removed since it conflicts with the %2$s's %3$s trait." ),
2530  u.mutation_name( suspect_trait ), u.prof->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ), new_trait.name() );
2531  u.toggle_trait_deps( suspect_trait );
2532  }
2533  }
2534  }
2535  }
2536  // Add traits for the new profession (and perhaps scenario, if, for example,
2537  // both the scenario and old profession require the same trait)
2538  u.add_traits();
2539  } else if( action == "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) {
2540  outfit = !outfit;
2541  recalc_profs = true;
2542  } else if( action == "CHANGE_GENDER" ) {
2543  u.male = !u.male;
2544  profession_sorter.male = u.male;
2545  if( !profession_sorter.sort_by_points ) {
2546  std::sort( sorted_profs.begin(), sorted_profs.end(), profession_sorter );
2547  }
2548  recalc_profs = true;
2549  } else if( action == "SORT" ) {
2550  profession_sorter.sort_by_points = !profession_sorter.sort_by_points;
2551  recalc_profs = true;
2552  } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
2553  string_input_popup()
2554  .title( _( "Search:" ) )
2555  .width( 60 )
2556  .description( _( "Search by profession name." ) )
2557  .edit( filterstring );
2558  recalc_profs = true;
2559  } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
2560  if( !filterstring.empty() ) {
2561  filterstring.clear();
2562  recalc_profs = true;
2563  }
2564  } else if( action == "RANDOMIZE" ) {
2565  cur_id = rng( 0, profs_length - 1 );
2566  }
2567  if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description || recalc_profs ) {
2568  details_recalc = true;
2569  }
2570 
2571  } while( true );
2572 }

2574 static std::string assemble_hobby_details( const avatar &u, const input_context &ctxt,
2575  const std::vector<string_id<profession>> &sorted_hobbies, const int cur_id,
2576  const std::string &notes )
2577 {
2578  std::string assembled;
2579 
2580  std::string hobby_name = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male );
2581  if( get_option<bool>( "SCREEN_READER_MODE" ) && !notes.empty() ) {
2582  hobby_name = hobby_name.append( string_format( " - %s", notes ) );
2583  }
2584 
2585  assembled += string_format( g_switch_msg( u ), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_GENDER" ),
2586  hobby_name ) + "\n";
2587  assembled += string_format( dress_switch_msg(), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) ) + "\n";
2588 
2589  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background story:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2590  assembled += colorize( sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->description( u.male ), c_green ) + "\n";
2591 
2592  // Background addictions
2593  const auto prof_addictions = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->addictions();
2594  if( !prof_addictions.empty() ) {
2595  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background addictions:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2596  for( const addiction &a : prof_addictions ) {
2597  const char *format = pgettext( "set_profession_addictions", "%1$s (%2$d)" );
2598  assembled += string_format( format, a.type->get_name().translated(), a.intensity ) + "\n";
2599  }
2600  }
2601 
2602  // Background traits
2603  const auto prof_traits = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->get_locked_traits();
2604  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background traits:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2605  if( prof_traits.empty() ) {
2606  assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_trait", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2607  } else {
2608  for( const trait_and_var &t : prof_traits ) {
2609  assembled += t.name() + "\n";
2610  }
2611  }
2612 
2613  // Background skills
2614  const profession::StartingSkillList prof_skills = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->skills();
2615  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background skill experience:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2616  if( prof_skills.empty() ) {
2617  assembled += pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "None" ) + std::string( "\n" );
2618  } else {
2619  for( const auto &sl : prof_skills ) {
2620  const Skill &skill = sl.first.obj();
2621  const int level = sl.second;
2622  if( level < 1 ) {
2623  debugmsg( "Unexpected skill level for %s: %d", skill.ident().str(), level );
2624  continue;
2625  }
2626  std::string skill_degree;
2627  if( level == 1 ) {
2628  skill_degree = pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "beginner" );
2629  } else if( level == 2 ) {
2630  skill_degree = pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "intermediate" );
2631  } else if( level == 3 ) {
2632  skill_degree = pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "competent" );
2633  } else {
2634  skill_degree = pgettext( "set_profession_skill", "advanced" );
2635  }
2636  assembled += string_format( "%s (%s)", skill.name(), skill_degree ) + "\n";
2637  }
2638  }
2639 
2640  // Background Proficiencies
2641  std::vector<proficiency_id> prof_proficiencies = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->proficiencies();
2642  if( !prof_proficiencies.empty() ) {
2643  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background proficiencies:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2644  for( const proficiency_id &prof : prof_proficiencies ) {
2645  assembled += prof->name() + ": " + colorize( prof->description(), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2646  }
2647  }
2648 
2649  auto prof_CBMs = sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->CBMs();
2650  if( !prof_CBMs.empty() ) {
2651  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background bionics:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2652  std::sort( std::begin( prof_CBMs ), std::end( prof_CBMs ), []( const bionic_id & a,
2653  const bionic_id & b ) {
2654  return a->activated && !b->activated;
2655  } );
2656  for( const auto &b : prof_CBMs ) {
2657  const bionic_data &cbm = b.obj();
2658  if( cbm.activated && cbm.has_flag( json_flag_BIONIC_TOGGLED ) ) {
2659  assembled += string_format( _( "%s (toggled)" ), cbm.name ) + "\n";
2660  } else if( cbm.activated ) {
2661  assembled += string_format( _( "%s (activated)" ), cbm.name ) + "\n";
2662  } else {
2663  assembled += cbm.name + "\n";
2664  }
2665  }
2666  }
2667 
2668  // Background spells
2669  if( !sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->spells().empty() ) {
2670  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background spells:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2671  for( const std::pair<spell_id, int> spell_pair : sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->spells() ) {
2672  assembled += string_format( _( "%s level %d" ), spell_pair.first->name, spell_pair.second ) + "\n";
2673  }
2674  }
2675 
2676  // Background missions
2677  if( !sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->missions().empty() ) {
2678  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Background missions:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
2679  for( mission_type_id mission_id : sorted_hobbies[cur_id]->missions() ) {
2680  assembled += mission_type::get( mission_id )->tname() + "\n";
2681  }
2682  }
2683 
2684  return assembled;
2685 }

2776  std::string cur_hob_notes;

2841  const int recmax = hobbies_length;

2843  int scrollbar_pos = iStartPos;
2844 
2845  if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
2846  break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
2847  } else if( details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt )
2848  || navigate_ui_list( action, cur_id, scroll_rate, recmax, true ) ) {
2849  // NO FURTHER ACTION REQUIRED
2850  } else if( list_sb.handle_dragging( action, ctxt.get_coordinates_text( catacurses::stdscr ),
2851  scrollbar_pos ) ) {
2852  if( scrollbar_pos != iStartPos ) {
2853  iStartPos = scrollbar_pos;
2854  cur_id = iStartPos + ( iContentHeight - 1 ) / 2;

2857  // Do not allow selection of hobby if there's a trait conflict
2858  const profession *hobb = &sorted_hobbies[cur_id].obj();
2859  bool conflict_found = false;
2860  for( const trait_and_var &new_trait : hobb->get_locked_traits() ) {
2861  if( u.has_conflicting_trait( new_trait.trait ) ) {
2862  for( const profession *hobby : u.hobbies ) {
2863  for( const trait_and_var &suspect : hobby->get_locked_traits() ) {
2864  if( are_conflicting_traits( new_trait.trait, suspect.trait ) ) {
2865  conflict_found = true;
2866  popup( _( "The trait [%1$s] conflicts with background [%2$s]'s trait [%3$s]." ), new_trait.name(),
2867  hobby->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ), suspect.name() );
2868  }
2869  }
2870  }
2871  }
2872  }
2873  if( conflict_found ) {
2874  continue;
2875  }
2876 
2877  // Toggle hobby
2878  bool enabling = false;
2879  if( u.hobbies.count( hobb ) == 0 ) {
2880  // Add hobby, and decrement point cost
2881  u.hobbies.insert( hobb );
2882  enabling = true;
2883  } else {
2884  // Remove hobby and refund point cost
2885  u.hobbies.erase( hobb );
2886  }
2887 
2888  // Selecting a hobby will, under certain circumstances, change the detail text
2889  details_recalc = true;
2890 
2891  // Add or remove traits from hobby
2892  for( const trait_and_var &cur : hobb->get_locked_traits() ) {
2893  const trait_id &trait = cur.trait;
2894  if( enabling ) {
2895  if( !u.has_trait( trait ) ) {
2896  u.toggle_trait_deps( trait );
2897  }
2898  continue;
2899  }
2900  int from_other_hobbies = u.prof->is_locked_trait( trait ) ? 1 : 0;
2901  for( const profession *hby : u.hobbies ) {
2902  if( hby->ident() != hobb->ident() && hby->is_locked_trait( trait ) ) {
2903  from_other_hobbies++;
2904  }
2905  }
2906  if( from_other_hobbies > 0 ) {
2907  continue;
2908  }
2909  u.toggle_trait_deps( trait );
2910  }
2911 
2912  } else if( action == "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) {
2913  outfit = !outfit;
2914  recalc_hobbies = true;
2915  } else if( action == "CHANGE_GENDER" ) {
2916  u.male = !u.male;
2917  profession_sorter.male = u.male;

2919  std::sort( sorted_hobbies.begin(), sorted_hobbies.end(), profession_sorter );
2920  }
2921  recalc_hobbies = true;
2922  } else if( action == "SORT" ) {
2923  profession_sorter.sort_by_points = !profession_sorter.sort_by_points;
2924  recalc_hobbies = true;
2925  } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
2926  string_input_popup()
2927  .title( _( "Search:" ) )
2928  .width( 60 )
2929  .description( _( "Search by background name." ) )
2930  .edit( filterstring );
2931  recalc_hobbies = true;
2932  } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
2933  if( !filterstring.empty() ) {
2934  filterstring.clear();
2935  recalc_hobbies = true;
2936  }
2937  } else if( action == "RANDOMIZE" ) {
2938  cur_id = rng( 0, hobbies_length - 1 );
2939  }
2940 
2941  if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description || recalc_hobbies ) {
2942  details_recalc = true;
2943  }
2944  } while( true );
2945 }
2946 
2947 /**
2948  * @return The skill points to consume when a skill is increased (by one level) from the
2949  * current level.
2950  *
2951  * @note: There is one exception: if the current level is 0, it can be boosted by 2 levels for 1 point.
2952  */
2953 static int skill_increment_cost( const Character &u, const skill_id &skill )
2954 {
2955  return std::max( 1, ( static_cast<int>( u.get_skill_level( skill ) ) + 1 ) / 2 );
2956 }
2957 
2958 static std::string assemble_skill_details( const avatar &u,
2959  const std::map<skill_id, int> &prof_skills, const Skill *currentSkill )
2960 {
2961  std::string assembled;
2962  // We want recipes from profession skills displayed, but
2963  // without boosting the skills. Copy the skills, and boost the copy
2964  SkillLevelMap with_prof_skills = u.get_all_skills();
2965  for( const auto &sk : prof_skills ) {
2966  with_prof_skills.mod_skill_level( sk.first, sk.second );
2967  }
2968 
2969  std::map<std::string, std::vector<std::pair<std::string, int> > > recipes;
2970  for( const auto &e : recipe_dict ) {
2971  const recipe &r = e.second;
2972  if( r.is_practice() || r.has_flag( "SECRET" ) ) {
2973  continue;
2974  }
2975  //Find out if the current skill and its level is in the requirement list
2976  auto req_skill = r.required_skills.find( currentSkill->ident() );
2977  int skill = req_skill != r.required_skills.end() ? req_skill->second : 0;
2978  bool would_autolearn_recipe =
2979  recipe_dict.all_autolearn().count( &r ) &&
2980  with_prof_skills.meets_skill_requirements( r.autolearn_requirements );
2981 
2982  if( !would_autolearn_recipe && !r.never_learn &&
2983  ( r.skill_used == currentSkill->ident() || skill > 0 ) &&
2984  with_prof_skills.has_recipe_requirements( r ) ) {
2985 
2986  recipes[r.skill_used->name()].emplace_back( r.result_name( /*decorated=*/true ),
2987  ( skill > 0 ) ? skill : r.difficulty );
2988  }
2989  // TODO: Find out why kevlar gambeson hood disppears when going from tailoring 7->8
2990  }
2991 
2992  for( auto &elem : recipes ) {
2993  std::sort( elem.second.begin(), elem.second.end(),
2994  []( const std::pair<std::string, int> &lhs,
2995  const std::pair<std::string, int> &rhs ) {
2996  return localized_compare( std::make_pair( lhs.second, lhs.first ),
2997  std::make_pair( rhs.second, rhs.first ) );
2998  } );
2999 
3000  const std::string rec_temp = enumerate_as_string( elem.second.begin(), elem.second.end(),
3001  []( const std::pair<std::string, int> &rec ) {
3002  return string_format( "%s (%d)", rec.first, rec.second );
3003  } );
3004 
3005  if( elem.first == currentSkill->name() ) {
3006  assembled = "\n\n" + colorize( rec_temp, c_brown ) + std::move( assembled );
3007  } else {
3008  assembled += "\n\n" + colorize( "[" + elem.first + "]\n" + rec_temp, c_light_gray );
3009  }
3010  }
3011 
3012  assembled = currentSkill->description() + assembled;
3013  return assembled;
3014 }

3018  return string_format(
3019  _( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings.\n"
3020  "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> / <color_light_green>%s</color> to select skill.\n"
3021  "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to increase skill or "
3022  "<color_light_green>%s</color> to decrease skill.\n"
3023  "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to go to the next tab or "
3024  "<color_light_green>%s</color> to return to the previous tab." ),
3025  ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ), ctxt.get_desc( "UP" ), ctxt.get_desc( "DOWN" ),
3026  ctxt.get_desc( "RIGHT" ), ctxt.get_desc( "LEFT" ),
3027  ctxt.get_desc( "NEXT_TAB" ), ctxt.get_desc( "PREV_TAB" ) );
3028 }

3210  const int pos_for_curr_description = cur_pos;

3213  if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
3214  break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
3215  } else if( details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt ) ) {
3216  // NO FURTHER ACTION REQUIRED
3217  } else if( list_sb.handle_dragging( action, ctxt.get_coordinates_text( catacurses::stdscr ),
3218  scrollbar_pos ) ) {
3219  if( scrollbar_pos != cur_offset ) {
3220  cur_offset = scrollbar_pos;
3221  cur_pos = cur_offset + ( iContentHeight - 1 ) / 2; // Get approximate location
3222  get_next( false ); // Then make sure it's a skill rather than a heading
3223  if( cur_pos < num_skills / 2 ) {
3224  get_next( true ); // Go back to where we were to ensure we can drag to the top
3225  }
3226  }
3227  } else if( navigate_ui_list( action, cur_pos, scroll_rate, skill_list.size(), true ) ) {
3228  // omitting action == "PAGE_UP", because that shouldn't wrap
3229  const bool go_up = action == "UP" || action == "SCROLL_UP";
3230  get_next( go_up );
3231  } else if( action == "LEFT" ) {
3232  const skill_id &skill_id = currentSkill->ident();
3233  const int level = u.get_skill_level( skill_id );
3234  if( level > 0 ) {
3235  // For balance reasons, increasing a skill from level 0 gives 1 extra level for free, but
3236  // decreasing it from level 2 forfeits the free extra level (thus changes it to 0)
3237  // this only matters in legacy character creation modes
3238  u.mod_skill_level( skill_id, level == 2 && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ? -2 : -1 );
3239  u.set_knowledge_level( skill_id, static_cast<int>( u.get_skill_level( skill_id ) ) );
3240  }
3241  details_recalc = true;
3242  } else if( action == "RIGHT" ) {
3243  const skill_id &skill_id = currentSkill->ident();
3244  const int level = u.get_skill_level( skill_id );
3245  if( level < MAX_SKILL ) {
3246  // For balance reasons, increasing a skill from level 0 gives 1 extra level for free
3247  // this only matters in legacy character creation modes
3248  u.mod_skill_level( skill_id, level == 0 && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ? +2 : +1 );
3249  u.set_knowledge_level( skill_id, static_cast<int>( u.get_skill_level( skill_id ) ) );
3250  }
3251  details_recalc = true;
3252  }
3253  if( cur_pos != pos_for_curr_description ) {
3254  details_recalc = true;
3255  }
3256  } while( true );
3257 }
3258 
3259 static struct {
3260  bool sort_by_points = true;
3261  bool male = false;
3262  bool cities_enabled = false;
3263  /** @related player */
3264  bool operator()( const scenario *a, const scenario *b ) const {
3265  if( cities_enabled ) {
3266  // The generic ("Unemployed") profession should be listed first.
3267  const scenario *gen = scenario::generic();
3268  if( b == gen ) {
3269  return false;
3270  } else if( a == gen ) {
3271  return true;
3272  }
3273  }
3274 
3275  if( !a->can_pick().success() && b->can_pick().success() ) {
3276  return false;
3277  }
3278 
3279  if( a->can_pick().success() && !b->can_pick().success() ) {
3280  return true;
3281  }
3282 
3283  if( !cities_enabled && a->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) != b->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) ) {
3284  return a->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) < b->has_flag( "CITY_START" );
3285  } else if( sort_by_points ) {
3286  return a->point_cost() < b->point_cost();
3287  } else {
3288  return localized_compare( a->gender_appropriate_name( male ),
3289  b->gender_appropriate_name( male ) );
3290  }
3291  }
3292 } scenario_sorter;
3293 
3294 static std::string assemble_scenario_details( const avatar &u, const input_context &ctxt,
3295  const scenario *current_scenario, const std::string &notes )
3296 {
3297  std::string assembled;
3298  // Display Origin
3299  const std::string mod_src = enumerate_as_string( current_scenario->src,
3300  []( const std::pair<string_id<scenario>, mod_id> &source ) {
3301  return string_format( "'%s'", source.second->name() );
3302  }, enumeration_conjunction::arrow );
3303  assembled += string_format( _( "Origin: %s" ), mod_src ) + "\n";
3304 
3305  std::string scenario_name = current_scenario->gender_appropriate_name( !u.male );
3306  if( get_option<bool>( "SCREEN_READER_MODE" ) && !notes.empty() ) {
3307  scenario_name = scenario_name.append( string_format( " - %s", notes ) );
3308  }
3309  assembled += string_format( g_switch_msg( u ), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_GENDER" ),
3310  scenario_name ) + "\n";
3311  assembled += string_format( dress_switch_msg(), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) ) + "\n";
3312 
3313  assembled += string_format(
3314  _( "Press <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change cataclysm start date, <color_light_green>%2$s</color> to change game start date, <color_light_green>%3$s</color> to reset calendar." ),
3315  ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_START_OF_CATACLYSM" ), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_START_OF_GAME" ),
3316  ctxt.get_desc( "RESET_CALENDAR" ) ) + "\n";
3317  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Story:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
3318  assembled += colorize( current_scenario->description( u.male ), c_green ) + "\n";
3319  const std::optional<achievement_id> scenRequirement = current_scenario->get_requirement();
3320 
3321  if( scenRequirement.has_value() ||
3322  ( current_scenario->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) && !scenario_sorter.cities_enabled ) ) {
3323  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Requirements:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
3324  if( current_scenario->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) && !scenario_sorter.cities_enabled ) {
3325  const std::string scenUnavailable =
3326  _( "This scenario is not available in this world due to city size settings." );
3327  assembled += colorize( scenUnavailable, c_red ) + "\n";
3328  }
3329  if( scenRequirement.has_value() ) {
3330  nc_color requirement_color = c_red;
3331  if( current_scenario->can_pick().success() ) {
3332  requirement_color = c_green;
3333  }
3334  assembled += colorize( string_format( _( "Complete \"%s\"" ), scenRequirement.value()->name() ),
3335  requirement_color ) + "\n";
3336  }
3337  }
3338 
3339  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Professions:" ), COL_HEADER );
3340  assembled += string_format( _( "\n%s" ), current_scenario->prof_count_str() );
3341  assembled += _( ", default:\n" );
3342 
3343  auto psorter = profession_sorter;
3344  psorter.sort_by_points = true;
3345  const auto permitted = current_scenario->permitted_professions();
3346  const auto default_prof = *std::min_element( permitted.begin(), permitted.end(), psorter );
3347  const int prof_points = default_prof->point_cost();
3348 
3349  assembled += default_prof->gender_appropriate_name( u.male );
3350  if( prof_points > 0 ) {
3351  assembled += colorize( string_format( " (-%d)", prof_points ), c_red );
3352  } else if( prof_points < 0 ) {
3353  assembled += colorize( string_format( " (+%d)", -prof_points ), c_green );
3354  }
3355  assembled += "\n";
3356 
3357  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Location:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
3358  assembled += string_format( _( "%s (%d locations, %d variants)" ),
3359  current_scenario->start_name(),
3360  current_scenario->start_location_count(),
3361  current_scenario->start_location_targets_count() ) + "\n";
3362 
3363  if( current_scenario->vehicle() ) {
3364  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Vehicle:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
3365  assembled += current_scenario->vehicle()->name + "\n";
3366  }
3367 
3368  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Start of cataclysm:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
3369  assembled += to_string( current_scenario->start_of_cataclysm() ) + "\n";
3370 
3371  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Start of game:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
3372  assembled += to_string( current_scenario->start_of_game() ) + "\n";
3373 
3374  if( !current_scenario->missions().empty() ) {
3375  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario missions:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
3376  for( mission_type_id mission_id : current_scenario->missions() ) {
3377  assembled += mission_type::get( mission_id )->tname() + "\n";
3378  }
3379  }
3380 
3381  //TODO: Move this to JSON?
3382  const std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> flag_descriptions = {
3383  { "FIRE_START", translate_marker( "Fire nearby" ) },
3384  { "SUR_START", translate_marker( "Zombies nearby" ) },
3385  { "HELI_CRASH", translate_marker( "Various limb wounds" ) },
3386  { "LONE_START", translate_marker( "No starting NPC" ) },
3387  { "BORDERED", translate_marker( "Starting location is bordered by an immense wall" ) },
3388  };
3389 
3390  bool flag_header_added = false;
3391  for( const std::pair<std::string, std::string> &flag_pair : flag_descriptions ) {
3392  if( current_scenario->has_flag( std::get<0>( flag_pair ) ) ) {
3393  if( !flag_header_added ) {
3394  assembled += "\n" + colorize( _( "Scenario Flags:" ), COL_HEADER ) + "\n";
3395  flag_header_added = true;
3396  }
3397  assembled += _( std::get<1>( flag_pair ) ) + "\n";
3398  }
3399  }
3400 
3401  return assembled;
3402 }

3404 void set_scenario( tab_manager &tabs, avatar &u, pool_type pool )
3405 {
3406  int cur_id = 0;
3407  size_t iContentHeight = 0;
3408  int iStartPos = 0;
3409 
3410  ui_adaptor ui;
3411  catacurses::window w;
3412  catacurses::window w_details_pane;
3413  scrolling_text_view details( w_details_pane );

3416  scrollbar list_sb;
3417 
3418  const bool screen_reader_mode = get_option<bool>( "SCREEN_READER_MODE" );
3419

3438  ctxt.register_action( "SORT" );

3443  ctxt.register_action( "RESET_FILTER" );
3444  ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_START_OF_CATACLYSM" );
3445  ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_START_OF_GAME" );
3446  ctxt.register_action( "RESET_CALENDAR" );
3447 
3448  bool recalc_scens = true;
3449  size_t scens_length = 0;
3450  std::string filterstring;
3451  std::vector<const scenario *> sorted_scens;
3452 
3453  ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {

3455  tabs.draw( w );
3456  mvwputch( w, point( TERMX / 2, iHeaderHeight - 1 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXXX ); // ''
3457  mvwputch( w, point( TERMX / 2, TERMY - 1 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XXOX ); // ''
3458  draw_filter_and_sorting_indicators( w, ctxt, filterstring, scenario_sorter );
3459 
3460  const bool cur_id_is_valid = cur_id >= 0 && static_cast<size_t>( cur_id ) < sorted_scens.size();
3461  if( cur_id_is_valid ) {
3462  int netPointCost = sorted_scens[cur_id]->point_cost() - get_scenario()->point_cost();
3463  ret_val<void> can_afford = sorted_scens[cur_id]->can_afford(
3464  *get_scenario(),
3465  skill_points_left( u, pool ) );
3466  ret_val<void> can_pick = sorted_scens[cur_id]->can_pick();
3467 
3468  int pointsForScen = sorted_scens[cur_id]->point_cost();
3469  bool negativeScen = pointsForScen < 0;
3470  if( negativeScen ) {
3471  pointsForScen *= -1;
3472  }
3473  // Draw header.
3474  draw_points( w, pool, u, netPointCost );
3475  if( pool != pool_type::FREEFORM ) {
3476 
3477  const char *scen_msg_temp;
3478 
3479  if( negativeScen ) {
3480  scen_msg_temp = n_gettext( "Scenario earns %2$d point",
3481  "Scenario earns %2$d points", pointsForScen );
3482  } else {
3483  scen_msg_temp = n_gettext( "Scenario costs %2$d point",
3484  "Scenario costs %2$d points", pointsForScen );
3485  }
3486 
3487  int pMsg_length = utf8_width( remove_color_tags( pools_to_string( u, pool ) ) );
3488  mvwprintz( w, point( pMsg_length + 9, 3 ), can_afford.success() ? c_green : c_light_red,
3489  scen_msg_temp, sorted_scens[cur_id]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ), pointsForScen );
3490  }
3491  }
3492

3494  calcStartPos( iStartPos, cur_id, iContentHeight, scens_length );
3495  const int end_pos = iStartPos + std::min( iContentHeight, scens_length );
3496  std::string current_scenario_notes;
3497  for( int i = iStartPos; i < end_pos; i++ ) {
3498  nc_color col;
3499  if( get_scenario() != sorted_scens[i] ) {
3500  if( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_scens[i] == sorted_scens[cur_id] &&
3501  ( ( sorted_scens[i]->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) && !scenario_sorter.cities_enabled ) ||
3502  !sorted_scens[i]->can_pick().success() ) ) {
3503  col = h_dark_gray;
3504  if( i == cur_id ) {
3505  current_scenario_notes = _( "unavailable" );
3506  }
3507  } else if( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_scens[i] != sorted_scens[cur_id] &&
3508  ( ( sorted_scens[i]->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) && !scenario_sorter.cities_enabled ) ||
3509  !sorted_scens[i]->can_pick().success() ) ) {
3510  col = c_dark_gray;
3511  if( i == cur_id ) {
3512  current_scenario_notes = _( "unavailable" );
3513  }
3514  } else {
3515  col = ( cur_id_is_valid && sorted_scens[i] == sorted_scens[cur_id] ? COL_SELECT : c_light_gray );
3516  }
3517  } else {
3518  col = ( cur_id_is_valid &&
3519  sorted_scens[i] == sorted_scens[cur_id] ? hilite( c_light_green ) : COL_SKILL_USED );
3520  if( i == cur_id ) {
3521  current_scenario_notes = _( "active" );
3522  }
3523  }
3524  const point opt_pos( 2, iHeaderHeight + i - iStartPos );
3525  if( screen_reader_mode ) {
3526  // The list of options only clutters up the screen in screen reader mode
3527  } else {
3528  mvwprintz( w, opt_pos, col,
3529  sorted_scens[i]->gender_appropriate_name( u.male ) );
3530  }
3531  }
3532 
3533  if( details_recalc && cur_id_is_valid ) {
3534  details.set_text( assemble_scenario_details( u, ctxt, sorted_scens[cur_id],
3535  current_scenario_notes ) );
3536  details_recalc = false;
3537  }
3538 
3539  list_sb.offset_x( 0 )
3540  .offset_y( 6 )
3541  .content_size( scens_length )
3542  .viewport_pos( iStartPos )
3543  .viewport_size( iContentHeight )
3544  .apply( w );
3545 
3546  wnoutrefresh( w );
3547  ui.set_cursor( w_details_pane, point_zero );
3548  details.draw( c_light_gray );
3549  } );
3550 
3551  do {
3552  if( recalc_scens ) {
3553  options_manager::options_container &wopts = world_generator->active_world->WORLD_OPTIONS;
3554  std::vector<const scenario *> new_scens;
3555  for( const scenario &scen : scenario::get_all() ) {
3556  if( scen.scen_is_blacklisted() ) {
3557  continue;
3558  }
3559  new_scens.push_back( &scen );
3560  }
3561  scenario_sorter.male = u.male;
3562  scenario_sorter.cities_enabled = wopts["CITY_SIZE"].getValue() != "0";
3563  if( ( scens_length = filter_entries( u, cur_id, sorted_scens, new_scens, get_scenario(),
3564  filterstring,
3565  scenario_sorter ) ) == 0 ) {
3566  filterstring.clear();
3567  continue;
3568  }
3569  recalc_scens = false;
3570  }
3571 
3572  ui_manager::redraw();
3573  const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
3574  const int scroll_rate = scens_length > 20 ? 5 : 2;
3575  const int id_for_curr_description = cur_id;
3576  int scrollbar_pos = iStartPos;
3577 
3578  if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
3579  break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
3580  } else if( details.handle_navigation( action, ctxt )
3581  || navigate_ui_list( action, cur_id, scroll_rate, scens_length, true ) ) {
3582  // NO FURTHER ACTION REQUIRED
3583  } else if( list_sb.handle_dragging( action, ctxt.get_coordinates_text( catacurses::stdscr ),
3584  scrollbar_pos ) ) {
3585  if( scrollbar_pos != iStartPos ) {
3586  iStartPos = scrollbar_pos;
3587  cur_id = iStartPos + ( iContentHeight - 1 ) / 2;
3588  }
3589  } else if( action == "CONFIRM" ) {
3590  // set arbitrarily high points and check if we have the achievment
3591  ret_val<void> can_pick = sorted_scens[cur_id]->can_pick();
3592 
3593  if( !can_pick.success() ) {
3594  popup( can_pick.str() );
3595  continue;
3596  }
3597 
3598  if( sorted_scens[cur_id]->has_flag( "CITY_START" ) && !scenario_sorter.cities_enabled ) {
3599  continue;
3600  }
3601  reset_scenario( u, sorted_scens[cur_id] );
3602  details_recalc = true;
3603  } else if( action == "CHANGE_OUTFIT" ) {
3604  outfit = !outfit;
3605  recalc_scens = true;
3606  } else if( action == "CHANGE_GENDER" ) {
3607  u.male = !u.male;
3608  recalc_scens = true;
3609  } else if( action == "SORT" ) {
3610  scenario_sorter.sort_by_points = !scenario_sorter.sort_by_points;
3611  recalc_scens = true;
3612  } else if( action == "FILTER" ) {
3613  string_input_popup()
3614  .title( _( "Search:" ) )
3615  .width( 60 )
3616  .description( _( "Search by scenario name." ) )
3617  .edit( filterstring );
3618  recalc_scens = true;
3619  } else if( action == "RESET_FILTER" ) {
3620  if( !filterstring.empty() ) {
3621  filterstring.clear();
3622  recalc_scens = true;
3623  }
3624  } else if( action == "RANDOMIZE" ) {
3625  cur_id = rng( 0, scens_length - 1 );
3626  } else if( action == "CHANGE_START_OF_CATACLYSM" ) {
3627  const scenario *scen = sorted_scens[cur_id];
3628  if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description ) {
3629  scen = get_scenario();
3630  }
3631  scen->change_start_of_cataclysm( calendar_ui::select_time_point( scen->start_of_cataclysm(),
3632  _( "Select cataclysm start date" ), calendar_ui::granularity::hour ) );
3633  details_recalc = true;
3634  } else if( action == "CHANGE_START_OF_GAME" ) {
3635  const scenario *scen = sorted_scens[cur_id];
3636  if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description ) {
3637  scen = get_scenario();
3638  }
3639  scen->change_start_of_game( calendar_ui::select_time_point( scen->start_of_game(),
3640  _( "Select game start date" ), calendar_ui::granularity::hour ) );
3641  details_recalc = true;
3642  } else if( action == "RESET_CALENDAR" ) {
3643  const scenario *scen = sorted_scens[cur_id];
3644  if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description ) {
3645  get_scenario()->reset_calendar();
3646  }
3647  scen->reset_calendar();
3648  details_recalc = true;
3649  }
3650 
3651  if( cur_id != id_for_curr_description || recalc_scens ) {
3652  details_recalc = true;
3653  }
3654  } while( true );
3655 }

3669 static void draw_name( ui_adaptor &ui, const catacurses::window &w_name,
3670  const avatar &you, const bool highlight,
3671  const bool no_name_entered )

3691 static void draw_gender( ui_adaptor &ui, const catacurses::window &w_gender,
3692  const avatar &you, const bool highlight )
3693 {
3694  const point male_pos( 1 + utf8_width( _( "Gender:" ) ), 0 );
3695  const point female_pos = male_pos + point( 2 + utf8_width( _( "Male" ) ), 0 );
3696 
3697  werase( w_gender );
3698  mvwprintz( w_gender, point_zero, highlight ? COL_SELECT : c_light_gray, _( "Gender:" ) );
3699  if( highlight && you.male ) {
3700  ui.set_cursor( w_gender, male_pos );
3701  }
3702  mvwprintz( w_gender, male_pos, ( you.male ? c_light_cyan : c_light_gray ),
3703  _( "Male" ) );
3704  if( highlight && !you.male ) {
3705  ui.set_cursor( w_gender, female_pos );
3706  }

3803 static std::string assemble_description_help( const input_context &ctxt, const bool allow_reroll )
3804 {
3805  if( !isWide ) {
3806  return string_format( _( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings." ),
3807  ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ) );

3810  _( "Press <color_light_green>%s</color> to view and alter keybindings." ),
3811  ctxt.get_desc( "HELP_KEYBINDINGS" ) )
3812  + string_format( _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to save character template." ),
3813  ctxt.get_desc( "SAVE_TEMPLATE" ) );
3814  if( !MAP_SHARING::isSharing() && allow_reroll ) { // no random names when sharing maps
3815  help_text += string_format(
3816  _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to pick a random name, "
3817  "<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all description values, "
3818  "<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all but scenario, or "
3819  "<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize everything." ),
3820  ctxt.get_desc( "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_NAME" ), ctxt.get_desc( "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_DESCRIPTION" ),
3821  ctxt.get_desc( "REROLL_CHARACTER" ), ctxt.get_desc( "REROLL_CHARACTER_WITH_SCENARIO" ) );
3822  } else {
3823  help_text += string_format(
3824  _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to pick a random name, "
3825  "<color_light_green>%s</color> to randomize all description values." ),
3826  ctxt.get_desc( "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_NAME" ), ctxt.get_desc( "RANDOMIZE_CHAR_DESCRIPTION" ) );
3827  }
3828  help_text += string_format(
3829  _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%1$s</color> to change cataclysm start date, "
3830  "<color_light_green>%2$s</color> to change game start date, "
3831  "<color_light_green>%3$s</color> to reset calendar." ),
3832  ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_START_OF_CATACLYSM" ), ctxt.get_desc( "CHANGE_START_OF_GAME" ),
3833  ctxt.get_desc( "RESET_CALENDAR" ) );
3834  if( !get_option<bool>( "SELECT_STARTING_CITY" ) ) {

3837  ctxt.get_desc( "CHOOSE_LOCATION" ) );
3838  } else {

3840  _( "\nPress <color_light_green>%s</color> to select a specific starting city and "

3843  }

3846  "to cycle through editable values." ),
3847  ctxt.get_desc( "UP" ), ctxt.get_desc( "DOWN" ) )

3957  ctxt.register_action( "REROLL_CHARACTER_WITH_SCENARIO" );
3958  }

3960  ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_OUTFIT" );

3963  ctxt.register_action( "CHANGE_START_OF_GAME" );
3964  ctxt.register_action( "RESET_CALENDAR" );
3965  if( get_option<bool>( "SELECT_STARTING_CITY" ) ) {
3966  ctxt.register_action( "CHOOSE_CITY" );
3967  }
3968  ctxt.register_action( "CHOOSE_LOCATION" );
3969  ctxt.register_action( "CONFIRM" );
3970 
3971  uilist select_location;
3972  select_location.text = _( "Select a starting location." );
3973  int offset = 1;
3974  const std::string random_start_location_text = string_format( n_gettext(
3975  "<color_red>* Random location *</color> (<color_white>%d</color> variant)",
3976  "<color_red>* Random location *</color> (<color_white>%d</color> variants)",
3977  get_scenario()->start_location_targets_count() ), get_scenario()->start_location_targets_count() );
3978  uilist_entry entry_random_start_location( RANDOM_START_LOC_ENTRY, true, -1,
3979  random_start_location_text );
3980  select_location.entries.emplace_back( entry_random_start_location );
3981  for( const start_location &loc : start_locations::get_all() ) {
3982  if( get_scenario()->allowed_start( loc.id ) ) {
3983  std::string loc_name = loc.name();
3984  if( loc.targets_count() > 1 ) {
3985  loc_name = string_format( n_gettext( "%s (<color_white>%d</color> variant)",
3986  "%s (<color_white>%d</color> variants)", loc.targets_count() ),
3987  loc_name, loc.targets_count() );
3988  }
3989 
3990  uilist_entry entry( loc.id.id().to_i(), true, -1, loc_name );
3991 
3992  select_location.entries.emplace_back( entry );
3993 
3994  if( !you.random_start_location && loc.id.id() == you.start_location.id() ) {
3995  select_location.selected = offset;
3996  }
3997  offset++;
3998  }
3999  }
4000  if( you.random_start_location ) {
4001  select_location.selected = 0;
4002  }
4003  select_location.setup();
4004  if( MAP_SHARING::isSharing() ) {
4005  you.name = MAP_SHARING::getUsername(); // set the current username as default character name
4006  } else if( !get_option<std::string>( "DEF_CHAR_NAME" ).empty() ) {
4007  you.name = get_option<std::string>( "DEF_CHAR_NAME" );
4008  }
4009 
4010  char_creation::description_selector current_selector = char_creation::NAME;
4011 
4012  bool no_name_entered = false;
4013  ui.on_redraw( [&]( ui_adaptor & ui ) {
4014  const std::string help_text = assemble_description_help( ctxt, allow_reroll );
4015  const int new_iHelpHeight = foldstring( help_text, getmaxx( w ) - 4 ).size();
4016  if( new_iHelpHeight != iHelpHeight ) {
4017  iHelpHeight = new_iHelpHeight;
4018  init_windows( ui );
4019  }
4020  werase( w );
4021  tabs.draw( w );
4022  draw_points( w, pool, you );
4023 
4024  //Draw the line between editable and non-editable stuff.
4025  for( int i = 0; i < getmaxx( w ); ++i ) {
4026  if( i == 0 ) {
4027  mvwputch( w, point( i, 9 ), BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XXXO );
4028  } else if( i == getmaxx( w ) - 1 ) {
4029  wputch( w, BORDER_COLOR, LINE_XOXX );
4030  } else {
4031  wputch( w, BORDER_COLOR, LINE_OXOX );
4032  }
4033  }
4034  wnoutrefresh( w );
4035 
4036  werase( w_stats );
4037  std::vector<std::string> vStatNames;
4038  mvwprintz( w_stats, point_zero, COL_HEADER, _( "Stats:" ) );
4039  vStatNames.emplace_back( _( "Strength:" ) );
4040  vStatNames.emplace_back( _( "Dexterity:" ) );
4041  vStatNames.emplace_back( _( "Intelligence:" ) );
4042  vStatNames.emplace_back( _( "Perception:" ) );
4043  int pos = 0;
4044  for( size_t i = 0; i < vStatNames.size(); i++ ) {
4045  pos = ( utf8_width( vStatNames[i] ) > pos ?
4046  utf8_width( vStatNames[i] ) : pos );
4047  mvwprintz( w_stats, point( 0, i + 1 ), c_light_gray, vStatNames[i] );
4048  }
4049  mvwprintz( w_stats, point( pos + 1, 1 ), c_light_gray, "%2d", you.str_max );
4050  mvwprintz( w_stats, point( pos + 1, 2 ), c_light_gray, "%2d", you.dex_max );
4051  mvwprintz( w_stats, point( pos + 1, 3 ), c_light_gray, "%2d", you.int_max );
4052  mvwprintz( w_stats, point( pos + 1, 4 ), c_light_gray, "%2d", you.per_max );
4053  wnoutrefresh( w_stats );
4054 
4055  if( isWide ) {
4056  werase( w_traits );
4057  mvwprintz( w_traits, point_zero, COL_HEADER, _( "Traits: " ) );
4058  std::vector<trait_and_var> current_traits = you.get_mutations_variants();
4059  std::sort( current_traits.begin(), current_traits.end(), trait_display_sort );
4060  if( current_traits.empty() ) {
4061  wprintz( w_traits, c_light_red, _( "None!" ) );
4062  } else {
4063  for( size_t i = 0; i < current_traits.size(); i++ ) {
4064  const trait_and_var current_trait = current_traits[i];
4065  trim_and_print( w_traits, point( 0, i + 1 ), getmaxx( w_traits ) - 1,
4066  current_trait.trait->get_display_color(), current_trait.name() );
4067  }
4068  }
4069  wnoutrefresh( w_traits );
4070  }
4071 
4072  if( isWide ) {
4073  werase( w_skills );
4074  mvwprintz( w_skills, point_zero, COL_HEADER, _( "Skills:" ) );
4075 
4076  auto skillslist = Skill::get_skills_sorted_by( [&]( const Skill & a, const Skill & b ) {
4077  const int level_a = you.get_skill_level_object( a.ident() ).exercised_level();
4078  const int level_b = you.get_skill_level_object( b.ident() ).exercised_level();
4079  return localized_compare( std::make_pair( -level_a, a.name() ),
4080  std::make_pair( -level_b, b.name() ) );
4081  } );
4082 
4083  int line = 1;
4084  bool has_skills = false;
4085  profession::StartingSkillList list_skills = you.prof->skills();
4086 
4087  for( const Skill *&elem : skillslist ) {
4088  int level = you.get_skill_level( elem->ident() );
4089 
4090  // Handle skills from professions
4091  if( pool != pool_type::TRANSFER ) {
4092  profession::StartingSkillList::iterator i = list_skills.begin();
4093  while( i != list_skills.end() ) {
4094  if( i->first == elem->ident() ) {
4095  level += i->second;
4096  break;
4097  }
4098  ++i;
4099  }
4100  }
4101 
4102  // Handle skills from hobbies
4103  int leftover_exp = 0;
4104  int exp_to_level = 10000 * ( level + 1 ) * ( level + 1 );
4105  for( const profession *profession : you.hobbies ) {
4106  profession::StartingSkillList hobby_skills = profession->skills();
4107  profession::StartingSkillList::iterator i = hobby_skills.begin();
4108  while( i != hobby_skills.end() ) {
4109  if( i->first == elem->ident() ) {
4110  int skill_exp_bonus = leftover_exp + calculate_cumulative_experience( i->second );
4111  // Calculate Level up to find final level and remaining exp
4112  while( skill_exp_bonus >= exp_to_level ) {
4113  level++;
4114  skill_exp_bonus -= exp_to_level;
4115  exp_to_level = 10000 * ( level + 1 ) * ( level + 1 );
4116  }
4117  leftover_exp = skill_exp_bonus;
4118  break;
4119  }
4120  ++i;
4121  }
4122  }
4123 
4124  if( level > 0 ) {
4125  const int exp_percent = 100 * leftover_exp / exp_to_level;
4126  mvwprintz( w_skills, point( 0, line ), c_light_gray,
4127  elem->name() + ":" );
4128  right_print( w_skills, line, 1, c_light_gray, string_format( "%d(%2d%%)", level, exp_percent ) );
4129  line++;
4130  has_skills = true;
4131  }
4132  }
4133 
4134  if( !has_skills ) {

4307  int min_allowed_age = 16;
4308  int max_allowed_age = 55;
4309 
4310  int min_allowed_height = Character::min_height();
4311  int max_allowed_height = Character::max_height();
4312 
4313  do {
4314  ui_manager::redraw();
4315  const std::string action = ctxt.handle_input();
4316  if( action == "NEXT_TAB" ) {
4317  if( pool == pool_type::ONE_POOL ) {
4318  if( points_used_total( you ) > point_pool_total() ) {
4319  popup( _( "Too many points allocated, change some features and try again." ) );
4320  continue;
4321  }
4322  } else if( pool == pool_type::MULTI_POOL ) {
4323  multi_pool p( you );
4324  if( p.skill_points_left < 0 ) {
4325  popup( _( "Too many points allocated, change some features and try again." ) );
4326  continue;
4327  }
4328  if( p.trait_points_left < 0 ) {
4329  popup( _( "Too many trait points allocated, change some traits or lower some stats and try again." ) );
4330  continue;
4331  }
4332  if( p.stat_points_left < 0 ) {
4333  popup( _( "Too many stat points allocated, lower some stats and try again." ) );
4334  continue;
4335  }
4336  }
4337  if( has_unspent_points( you ) && pool != pool_type::FREEFORM &&
4338  !query_yn( _( "Remaining points will be discarded, are you sure you want to proceed?" ) ) ) {
4339  continue;
4340  }
4341  if( you.name.empty() ) {
4342  no_name_entered = true;
4343  ui_manager::redraw();
4344  if( !query_yn( _( "Are you SURE you're finished? Your name will be randomly generated." ) ) ) {
4345  continue;
4346  } else {
4347  you.pick_name();
4348  tabs.complete = true;
4349  break;
4350  }
4351  }
4352  if( query_yn( _( "Are you SURE you're finished?" ) ) ) {
4353  tabs.complete = true;
4354  break;
4355  }
4356  continue;
4357  } else if( tabs.handle_input( action, ctxt ) ) {
4358  break; // Tab has changed or user has quit the screen
4359  } else if( action == "DOWN" ) {
4360  switch( current_selector ) {
4361  case char_creation::NAME:
4362  current_selector = char_creation::GENDER;
4363  break;
4364  case char_creation::GENDER:
4365  current_selector = char_creation::OUTFIT;
4366  break;
4367  case char_creation::OUTFIT:
4368  current_selector = char_creation::HEIGHT;
4369  break;
4370  case char_creation::HEIGHT:
4371  current_selector = char_creation::AGE;
4372  break;
4373  case char_creation::AGE:
4374  current_selector = char_creation::BLOOD;
4375  break;
4376  case char_creation::BLOOD:
4377  current_selector = char_creation::LOCATION;
4378  break;
4379  case char_creation::LOCATION:
4380  current_selector = char_creation::NAME;
4381  break;
4382  }
4383  } else if( action == "UP" ) {
4384  switch( current_selector ) {
4385  case char_creation::NAME:
4386  current_selector = char_creation::LOCATION;
4387  break;
4388  case char_creation::LOCATION:
4389  current_selector = char_creation::BLOOD;
4390  break;
4391  case char_creation::BLOOD:
4392  current_selector = char_creation::AGE;
4393  break;
4394  case char_creation::AGE:
4395  current_selector = char_creation::HEIGHT;
4396  break;
4397  case char_creation::HEIGHT:
4398  current_selector = char_creation::OUTFIT;
4399  break;
4400  case char_creation::OUTFIT:
4401  current_selector = char_creation::GENDER;
4402  break;
4403  case char_creation::GENDER:
4404  current_selector = char_creation::NAME;
4405  break;
4406  }
4407  } else if( action == "RIGHT" ) {
4408  switch( current_selector ) {
4409  case char_creation::HEIGHT:
4410  if( you.base_height() < max_allowed_height ) {
4411  you.mod_base_height( 1 );
4412  you.set_stored_kcal( you.get_healthy_kcal() );
4413  }
4414  break;
4415  case char_creation::AGE:
4416  if( you.base_age() < max_allowed_age ) {
4417  you.mod_base_age( 1 );
4418  }
4419  break;
4420  case char_creation::BLOOD:
4421  if( !you.blood_rh_factor ) {
4422  you.blood_rh_factor = true;
4423  break;
4424  }
4425  if( static_cast<blood_type>( static_cast<int>( you.my_blood_type ) + 1 ) != blood_type::num_bt ) {
4426  you.my_blood_type = static_cast<blood_type>( static_cast<int>( you.my_blood_type ) + 1 );
4427  you.blood_rh_factor = false;
4428  } else {
4429  you.my_blood_type = static_cast<blood_type>( 0 );
4430  you.blood_rh_factor = false;
4431  }
4432  break;
4433  case char_creation::GENDER:
4434  you.male = !you.male;
4435  break;
4436  case char_creation::OUTFIT:
4437  outfit = !outfit;
4438  break;
4439  default:
4440  break;
4441  }
4442  } else if( action == "LEFT" ) {
4443  switch( current_selector ) {
4444  case char_creation::HEIGHT:
4445  if( you.base_height() > min_allowed_height ) {
4446  you.mod_base_height( -1 );
4447  you.set_stored_kcal( you.get_healthy_kcal() );
4448  }
4449  break;
4450  case char_creation::AGE:
4451  if( you.base_age() > min_allowed_age ) {
4452  you.mod_base_age( -1 );
4453  }
4454  break;
4455  case char_creation::BLOOD:
4456  if( you.blood_rh_factor ) {
4457  you.blood_rh_factor = false;
4458  break;
4459  }
4460  if( you.my_blood_type != static_cast<blood_type>( 0 ) ) {
4461  you.my_blood_type = static_cast<blood_type>( static_cast<int>( you.my_blood_type ) - 1 );
4462  you.blood_rh_factor = true;
4463  } else {
4464  you.my_blood_type = static_cast<blood_type>( static_cast<int>( blood_type::num_bt ) - 1 );
4465  you.blood_rh_factor = true;
4466  }
4467  break;
4468  case char_creation::GENDER:
4469  you.male = !you.male;
4470  break;
4471  case char_creation::OUTFIT:
4472  outfit = !outfit;
4473  break;
4474  default:
4475  break;
4476  }
4477  } else if( action == "REROLL_CHARACTER" && allow_reroll ) {
4478  you.randomize( false );
4479  // Re-enter this tab again, but it forces a complete redrawing of it.
4480  break;
4481  } else if( action == "REROLL_CHARACTER_WITH_SCENARIO" && allow_reroll ) {
4482  you.randomize( true );
4483  // Re-enter this tab again, but it forces a complete redrawing of it.
4484  break;

4491  you.pick_name();

4509  you.male = !you.male;
4510  } else if( action == "CHANGE_START_OF_CATACLYSM" ) {

4517  _( "Select game start date" ), calendar_ui::granularity::hour ) );
4518  } else if( action == "RESET_CALENDAR" ) {

4521  std::vector<city> cities( city::get_all() );

4523  return std::tie( a.population, a.name ) > std::tie( b.population, b.name );
4524  };
4525  std::sort( cities.begin(), cities.end(), cities_cmp_population );

4610  gselect.addentry( 1, true, '2', _( "Male" ) );
4611  gselect.query();
4612  if( gselect.ret < 0 ) {
4613  break;
4614  }
4615  you.male = static_cast<bool>( gselect.ret );
4616  break;
4617  }
4618  case char_creation::OUTFIT: {
4619  uilist gselect;

4622  gselect.addentry( 1, true, '2', _( "Male" ) );

4630  case char_creation::LOCATION: {

4633  you.random_start_location = true;
4634  } else if( select_location.ret >= 0 ) {
4635  for( const start_location &loc : start_locations::get_all() ) {

4637  you.random_start_location = false;
4638  you.start_location = loc.id;

4641  }
4642  }
4643  break;

4645  }
4646  }
4647  } while( true );

4650 std::vector<trait_id> Character::get_base_traits() const

4653 }

4655 std::vector<trait_id> Character::get_mutations( bool include_hidden,
4656  bool ignore_enchantments, const std::function<bool( const mutation_branch & )> &filter ) const
4657 {
4658  std::vector<trait_id> result;
4659  result.reserve( my_mutations.size() + enchantment_cache->get_mutations().size() );
4660  for( const std::pair<const trait_id, trait_data> &t : my_mutations ) {
4661  const mutation_branch &mut = t.first.obj();
4662  if( include_hidden || mut.player_display ) {
4663  if( filter == nullptr || filter( mut ) ) {
4664  result.push_back( t.first );
4665  }
4666  }
4667  }
4668  if( !ignore_enchantments ) {
4669  for( const trait_id &ench_trait : enchantment_cache->get_mutations() ) {
4670  if( include_hidden || ench_trait->player_display ) {
4671  bool found = false;
4672  for( const trait_id &exist : result ) {
4673  if( exist == ench_trait ) {
4674  found = true;
4675  break;
4676  }
4677  }
4678  if( !found ) {
4679  if( filter == nullptr || filter( ench_trait.obj() ) ) {
4680  result.push_back( ench_trait );
4681  }
4682  }
4683  }
4684  }
4685  }
4686  return result;
4687 }
4688 
4689 std::vector<trait_and_var> Character::get_mutations_variants( bool include_hidden,
4690  bool ignore_enchantments ) const
4691 {
4692  std::vector<trait_and_var> result;
4693  result.reserve( my_mutations.size() + enchantment_cache->get_mutations().size() );
4694  for( const std::pair<const trait_id, trait_data> &t : my_mutations ) {
4695  if( include_hidden || t.first.obj().player_display ) {
4696  const std::string &variant = t.second.variant != nullptr ? t.second.variant->id : "";
4697  result.emplace_back( t.first, variant );
4698  }
4699  }
4700  if( !ignore_enchantments ) {
4701  for( const trait_id &ench_trait : enchantment_cache->get_mutations() ) {
4702  if( include_hidden || ench_trait->player_display ) {
4703  bool found = false;
4704  for( const trait_and_var &exist : result ) {
4705  if( exist.trait == ench_trait ) {
4706  found = true;
4707  break;
4708  }
4709  }
4710  if( !found ) {
4711  result.emplace_back( ench_trait, "" );
4712  }
4713  }
4714  }
4715  }
4716  return result;
4717 }
4718 
4719 void Character::clear_mutations()
4720 {
4721  while( !my_traits.empty() ) {
4722  my_traits.erase( *my_traits.begin() );
4723  }
4724  while( !my_mutations.empty() ) {
4725  const trait_id trait = my_mutations.begin()->first;
4726  my_mutations.erase( my_mutations.begin() );
4727  mutation_loss_effect( trait );
4728  }
4729  cached_mutations.clear();
4730  recalc_sight_limits();
4731  calc_encumbrance();
4732 }

4794 std::optional<std::string> query_for_template_name()
4795 {
4796  static const std::set<int> fname_char_blacklist = {
4797 #if defined(_WIN32)
4798  '\"', '*', '/', ':', '<', '>', '?', '\\', '|',
4799  '\x01', '\x02', '\x03', '\x04', '\x05', '\x06', '\x07', '\x09',
4800  '\x0B', '\x0C', '\x0E', '\x0F', '\x10', '\x11', '\x12',
4801  '\x13', '\x14', '\x16', '\x17', '\x18', '\x19', '\x1A',
4802  '\x1C', '\x1D', '\x1E', '\x1F'
4803 #else
4804  '/'
4805 #endif
4806  };
4807  std::string title = _( "Name of template:" );
4808  std::string desc = _( "Keep in mind you may not use special characters like / in filenames" );
4809 
4810  string_input_popup spop;
4811  spop.title( title );
4812  spop.description( desc );
4813  spop.width( FULL_SCREEN_WIDTH - utf8_width( title ) - 8 );
4814  for( int character : fname_char_blacklist ) {
4815  spop.add_callback( character, []() {
4816  return true;
4817  } );
4818  }
4819 
4820  spop.query_string( true );
4821  if( spop.canceled() ) {
4822  return std::nullopt;
4823  } else {
4824  return spop.text();
4825  }
4826 }

4844 void avatar::save_template( const std::string &name, pool_type pool )
4845 {
4846  write_to_file( PATH_INFO::templatedir() + name + ".template", [&]( std::ostream & fout ) {
4847  JsonOut jsout( fout, true );
4848 
4849  jsout.start_array();
4850 
4851  jsout.start_object();
4852  jsout.member( "limit", pool );
4853  jsout.member( "random_start_location", random_start_location );
4854  if( !random_start_location ) {
4855  jsout.member( "start_location", start_location );
4856  }
4857  jsout.end_object();
4858 
4859  serialize( jsout );
4860 
4861  jsout.end_array();
4862  }, _( "player template" ) );
4863 }
4864 
4865 bool avatar::load_template( const std::string &template_name, pool_type &pool )
4866 {
4867  return read_from_file_json( PATH_INFO::templatedir_path() / ( template_name + ".template" ), [&](
4868  const JsonValue & jv ) {
4869  // Legacy templates are an object. Current templates are an array of 0, 1, or 2 objects.
4870  JsonObject legacy_template;
4871  if( jv.test_array() ) {
4872  // not a legacy template
4873  JsonArray template_array = jv;
4874  if( template_array.empty() ) {
4875  return;
4876  }
4877 
4878  JsonObject jobj = template_array.get_object( 0 );
4879 
4880  jobj.get_int( "stat_points", 0 );
4881  jobj.get_int( "trait_points", 0 );
4882  jobj.get_int( "skill_points", 0 );
4883 
4884  pool = static_cast<pool_type>( jobj.get_int( "limit" ) );
4885 
4886  random_start_location = jobj.get_bool( "random_start_location", true );
4887  const std::string jobj_start_location = jobj.get_string( "start_location", "" );
4888 
4889  // get_scenario()->allowed_start( loc.ident() ) is checked once scenario loads in avatar::load()
4890  for( const class start_location &loc : start_locations::get_all() ) {
4891  if( loc.id.str() == jobj_start_location ) {
4892  random_start_location = false;
4893  this->start_location = loc.id;
4894  break;
4895  }
4896  }
4897 
4898  if( template_array.size() == 1 ) {
4899  return;
4900  }
4901  legacy_template = template_array.get_object( 1 );
4902  }
4903 
4904  deserialize( legacy_template );
4905 
4906  // If stored_calories the template is under a million (kcals < 1000), assume it predates the
4907  // kilocalorie-to-literal-calorie conversion and is off by a factor of 1000.
4908  if( get_stored_kcal() < 1000 ) {
4909  set_stored_kcal( 1000 * get_stored_kcal() );
4910  }
4911 
4912  if( MAP_SHARING::isSharing() ) {
4913  // just to make sure we have the right name
4914  name = MAP_SHARING::getUsername();
4915  }
4916  } );
4917 }
4918 
4919 void reset_scenario( avatar &u, const scenario *scen )
4920 {
4921  auto psorter = profession_sorter;
4922  psorter.sort_by_points = true;
4923  const auto permitted = scen->permitted_professions();
4924  const auto default_prof = *std::min_element( permitted.begin(), permitted.end(), psorter );
4925 
4926  u.random_start_location = true;
4927  u.str_max = 8;
4928  u.dex_max = 8;
4929  u.int_max = 8;
4930  u.per_max = 8;
4931  set_scenario( scen );
4932  u.prof = &default_prof.obj();
4933 
4934  u.hobbies.clear();
4935  u.add_default_background();
4936  u.clear_mutations();
4937  u.recalc_hp();
4938  u.empty_skills();
4939  u.add_traits();
4940 }
